ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_001.description: Water with no additives or impurities. It can be easily gathered from a variety of water sources, and is good for drinking, cleaning, and farming. It also has a number of uses in alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_001.name: Clean Water

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_002.description: A liquid that is extracted by grinding various plants. Drinking it is good for you, but it's too bitter for most people, so it has to be modified a bit before consumption.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_002.gathering: Schirm Marsh: ★★☆ staff bush at entrance
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_002.name: Plant Essence

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_003.description: Water that can be gathered near mines. It contains iron and other heavy materials, so drinking it can make people sick. It doesn't have a regular use, but it is useful for alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_003.gathering: Memorial Garden: ★☆☆ staff vase at entrance
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_003.name: Roteswasser Tonic

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_004.description: A glittery, green, semi-transparent liquid created for decorative purposes. Of course, it is not for drinking, so if you drink it, it will likely have some strange effect on your body.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_004.gathering: Fairystone Eater's Domain: ★☆☆ staff barrels in southeast
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_004.name: Jade Water

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_005.description: A strange liquid whose original use and method of creation are completely unknown. All anyone knows is that it was originally created beneath Kurken Island long ago, and is very useful in alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_005.name: Ether Aqua

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_006.description: Bubbling water with sparkling sounds. Drinking it is strangely stimulating. Better chilled than warm.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_006.gathering: Forgotten Ruins: ★☆☆ staff vase at entrance
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_006.name: Foamy Water

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_007.description: A rare and precious type of water containing ancient ingredients unlike anything that can be found in modern times. Due to this, it has a deep blue color and is extremely difficult to warm up.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_007.gathering: Cold Moon Cavern: ★★★ staff vase on altar
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_007.name: Ancient Blue Water

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_008.description: A type of milk popular within Ashra-am Baird. It comes from cows that eat a lot of clovers with their feed, which gives the milk a slightly more bitter flavor and a shorter expiration period.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_008.name: Clover Milk

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_009.description: An odd water full of impurities. It is so dirty that it has become black and muddy. Naturally, it is not used for drinking, but is a very useful ingredient for synthesis.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_009.gathering: Glass Flower Forest: ★★☆ axe rafflesia in southeast
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_009.name: Black Water

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_001.description: A common weed that grows absolutely everywhere. It has no distinct features, which is why it doesn't have a proper name. At the same time, it's also a staple ingredient in a large number of alchemy recipes.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_001.name: Nameless Grass

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_002.description: Old, dry grass that can be found anywhere on the road during cold seasons. Often used as an affordable incendiary agent because it is so flammable that it can be ignited simply by bringing it close to the fire.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_002.name: Dry Grass

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_003.description: A plant that feeds by absorbing toxins from its surroundings. It purifies the environment and is actually considered very beneficial. However, it is so full of poison it can lead to death if accidentally ingested.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_003.gathering: Abandoned Mine Railway: ★☆☆ sickle purple plant
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_003.name: Poison Grass

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_004.description: A wheat strain that grows throughout Roteswasser. Grows well in the iron-rich soil, but if you consume too much it may lead to iron overdose.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_004.name: Wasser Wheat

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_005.description: A leaf of a plant that used to grow an especially sweet fruit. However, due to its odd evolution the plant can no longer bear fruit, and instead stores all of its sugar in its leaves. Not a famous plant.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_005.gathering: Highway: ★☆☆ sickle berry bush in farm
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_005.name: Sweet Leaf

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_006.description: A leaf of the Delphi Rose. When dried out, it becomes a highly valued spice. Many love its luxurious scent, but there are also people who find it too strong.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_006.gathering: Fire People's Village: ★★☆ gather red flower
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_006.name: Rosen Leaf
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_006.shop_data:
(Plants) Stock Increase
Added by: Delphi Rose

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_007.description: A branch from a colossal tree that's been growing since before recorded history. It's filled with powerful life force. Many people think it's rare, but it's a big tree, so you can often find some just lying around.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_007.name: Ancient Branch
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_007.shop_data:
(Plants) Stock Increase
Added by: Emerald Glass

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_008.description: This special clover has a fourth leaf, and it's believed that if you find one it will bring you good luck. However, as an alchemy ingredient, it doesn't really matter how many leaves there are.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_008.name: Lucky Clover

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_009.description: A blue-tinged white clover. It's believed that it is the soil in the Roteswasser Kingdom that makes it blue. A very unusual plant for people who come from outside of the kingdom.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_009.name: Blue Clover

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_010.description: An herb capable of purifying contaminated water. Its blue color possibly comes from the region's soil, but the color seems to be the only difference.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_010.name: Blue Herb
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_010.shop_data:
(Plants) Stock Increase
Added by: Water Beast Scale

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_011.description: A plant that resembles a glass lantern. Despite its name, it doesn't actually give off light.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_011.gathering: Forest of Beginnings: ★☆☆ sickle large flowers in center-north area
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_011.name: Torch Grass
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_011.shop_data:
(Flowers) Stock Increase
Added by: Water Beast Fossil

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_012.description: A common ocean seaweed. It's rich in minerals, making it a good ingredient for salads or soup stock. They say it's also good for your hair, but research has so far proven inconclusive.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_012.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★☆☆ gather plant on northeast lakebed
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_012.name: Rishikelp
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_012.shop_data:
(Plants) Stock Increase
Added by: Beast Fin

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_013.description: A simple water-based algae. Though easy to overlook during the day, it becomes bioluminescent at night. It doesn't emit any heat, making it a popular source of light.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_013.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★★★ gather coral on central island
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_013.name: Glowing Diatom

ITEM_MAT_UNI_001.description: A very popular spiky fruit that can be found in most forests. It's edible, but is most often used as a throwing weapon.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_001.name: Uni

ITEM_MAT_UNI_002.description: An Uni with a golden glow. It's easily the rarest type of Uni, and can sometimes fetch a higher price than actual gold. Also, it is much tastier and more nutritious than a normal Uni, but its battle effects are the same.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_002.name: Gold Uni

ITEM_MAT_UNI_003.description: An Uni found in water, like rivers and oceans. It's able to absorb toxins in the water, purifying it. Its presence guarantees high-quality water, but since it absorbs poisons, touching the spikes can cause inflammation.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_003.gathering: Submerged Lower Town: ★☆☆ gather uni underwater at entrance
ITEM_MAT_UNI_003.name: Water Uni

ITEM_MAT_UNI_004.description: Just as its name says, this Uni has been around since ancient times. It can be found in certain ruins, but it's not fit for human consumption. It's said to be the ancestor of the modern Uni.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_004.gathering: Flowerpatch Cape: ★☆☆ gather Uni in northwest
ITEM_MAT_UNI_004.name: Ancient Uni

ITEM_MAT_UNI_005.description: This giant Uni is the result of generations of selective breeding. It's many times larger than a normal Uni, but its most distinctive features are the thick spikes that can be used as lumber and the inexplicable whiskers.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_005.name: Emperor Uni
ITEM_MAT_UNI_005.shop_data:
(Uni) Stock Increase
Added by: Holynut Lumber

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_001.description: A red flower found all across Roteswasser. It's a common flower that grows alongside roads, but it actually has medicinal value if you extract its essence with alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_001.name: Health Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_002.description: A blue poisonous flower found all across Roteswasser. It gets its name from its icy blue color. Its poison cannot be activated in any general way.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_002.name: Northern Wind Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_003.description: A yellow flower found all across Roteswasser. The flower's stalk contains sweet nectar. Children can often be seen picking these flowers.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_003.name: Sunny Honey Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_004.description: A plant that emits odd bubbles. Nobody knows how it does this, or why. But it has no known effect on humans, so most people aren't too concerned about it.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_004.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★☆☆ sickle large flowers neat entrance
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_004.name: Bubble Grass

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_005.description: A white flower that only grows near clean water. When you find a water source during your travels, the presence of this flower will let you know that it's drinkable.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_005.gathering: Schirm Marsh: ★☆☆ gather small blue flowers near tree
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_005.name: Spring Princess
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_005.shop_data:
(Flowers) Stock Increase
Added by: Plant Essence

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_006.description: A type of rose. It can be dried and ground to release an especially potent fragrance which is considered very elegant and used in popular perfumes.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_006.gathering: Fire People's Village: ★☆☆ gather red flower
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_006.name: Delphi Rose
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_006.shop_data:
Adds Item: Rosen Leaf
Added by: Delphi Rose Incense

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_007.description: A transparent flower found within the Glass Forest. It becomes cloudy if there are impurities, and all transparency is lost once the flower is picked.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_007.gathering: Glass Flower Forest: ★☆☆ sickle glass flower
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_007.name: Fragile

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_008.description: This flower can bloom in even the worst environments as long as there's even a little light. It releases pollen every hour on the dot, so it's often used as a clock or a timer.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_008.gathering: Crystal Cave of Oblivion: ★★☆ sickle large flower
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_008.name: Timeteller
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_008.shop_data:
(Medicinal) Stock Increase
Added by Spirit Bottle

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_009.description: A cactus that grows in especially harsh environments. It can store a good deal of water, which can be released by cutting into it. As such, it's highly valued among desert travelers.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_009.gathering: Sand Beast's Den: ★★★ staff purple bush
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_009.name: Polar Cactus
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_009.shop_data:
(Medicinal) Stock Increase
Added by: Dry Powder

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_010.description: A massive flower found in the Mirage Land. It floats in the air, releasing a mist of particles. It is the source of the fog covering the forest.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_010.gathering: Phantasm Forest: ★☆☆ sickle fallen poison flower
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_010.name: Dream Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_011.description: A decorative piece composed of a beautiful rose encased inside transparent resin. Many see it as the embodiment of eternal beauty, and it's a popular gift for women.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_011.gathering: Glass Flower Forest: ★★☆ sickle glass flower
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_011.name: Rose Crystal

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_001.description: A plant that grows just about anywhere in the world. It is known as "magic grass", because it has been used as an ingredient in many medicines since ancient times. Often used as a practice material in alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_001.gathering: Highway: ★☆☆ gather pink flower on southern hill
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_001.name: Taun

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_002.description: A Taun variant. It's not as common, but it's very easy to notice due to its remarkable height. Its medicinal properties seem to be stronger than those of a regular Taun.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_002.gathering: Highway: ★★☆ gather pink flowers on southern hill
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_002.name: Tall Taun

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_003.description: A branch from a young shrub, where some of the leaves are said to have mutated into flowers. It's generally boiled and used as a medicinal ingredient, or turned into a powder, depending on the region.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_003.name: Sapling Branch

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_004.description: Moss that grows on rocks near most bodies of water. It can be ground up or boiled to be used in medicinal treatments. It is also great as an alchemy ingredient.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_004.gathering: Highway: ★☆☆ sickle moss rocks near fishing pond
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_004.name: Medicinal Moss

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_005.description: Nutrient-rich soil. It's good for growing all different kinds of plants, so it's popular among farmers and gardeners to help grow their crops and other plants. It is also great as an alchemy material.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_005.gathering: Forest of Beginnings: ★☆☆ gather sack on river bank
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_005.name: Fertile Soil

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_006.description: Animal bones that are used to make medicine. The medicine is made by heating the bones over an open flame and then crushing them into powder. Old people who take it supposedly live long lives.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_006.name: Medium Medicine

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_007.description: A tree root that is used in medicine. In some parts of the world it is believed that the more bitter something is, the better it is for the body. It is, however, unknown if there is actually a sweet root that is bad for you.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_007.name: Bitter Root

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_008.description: Red grass that is used in medicine and dyes. It is stained red all year round, and if you touch it with your bare hands, your fingers will turn red.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_008.gathering: Highway: ★☆☆ gather lilies in fishing pond
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_008.name: Crimson Grass

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_009.description: A liquid from the legendary Dragonbone Valley. It's been used as a catalyst for powerful medicines since ancient times. It's so potent that it can actually be poisonous if you don't dilute it.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_009.gathering: Phantasm Forest: ★★☆ staff vase at entrance
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_009.name: Ancient Solution
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_009.shop_data:
Adds Item: Arbor Ivy
Added by: White Moon Frost

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_010.description: A very nutritious plant that provides a day's worth of nutrients. It's very sour, but juice made from its leaves was once extremely popular throughout Ashra-am Baird.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_010.name: Sage Grass

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_011.description: A leaf that is used to make first aid medicines. It's relatively easy to find just about anywhere in case of an emergency, because it's tough enough to grow at any altitude.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_011.gathering: Memorial Garden: ★☆☆ staff bush at entrance
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_011.name: Life Leaf

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_012.description: A medicinal ingredient popular among nobles and other people in high positions. It's highly effective, but also very rare and expensive, so very few hospitals are able to stock it.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_012.gathering: Central District: Gold Coin Exchange with Romy
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_012.name: Refueling Extract

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_013.description: The flower that this water comes from grows only in very hard-to-reach areas. Mixing it with medicine is good for the body, but some people drink it without even realizing what it is.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_013.name: Yugdore Water
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_013.shop_data:
Adds Item: Ancient Log
Added by: Holy Tree Leaf

ITEM_MAT_POISON_001.description: It looks like an ordinary plant, but when you pull it out of the ground, it will unleash a terrible scream. There is a legend saying that you will die if you hear the scream. In reality, it's annoying, but otherwise harmless.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_001.gathering: Schirm Marsh: ★★★ gathering ground plants in far northeast
ITEM_MAT_POISON_001.name: Resentful Scream

ITEM_MAT_POISON_002.description: Spores released from giant mushrooms. You can get a lot of them at once by hitting the mushrooms with a hammer. Just be careful not to breathe any in.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_002.gathering: Forest of Beginnings: ★★☆ gather orange mushroom
ITEM_MAT_POISON_002.name: Mushroom Powder

ITEM_MAT_POISON_003.description: Just a pile of smelly garbage. It includes table scraps and other rotting materials that can't be reused. Because it is toxic to humans, maybe it can be used as a poison...?
ITEM_MAT_POISON_003.name: Stinky Trash

ITEM_MAT_POISON_004.description: Remains of burned materials. There are some bigger bits and pieces, but mostly it's just ash. If ingested, it would naturally be poisonous.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_004.gathering: Highway: ★☆☆ bomb berry bush in farm
ITEM_MAT_POISON_004.name: Burnt Ash

ITEM_MAT_POISON_005.description: Although poisonous enough to kill a dragon, it gives off a surprisingly sweet fragrance when it blooms. As a result, it draws creatures to it, leading them to their early and tragic demise.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_005.name: Dragon Flower
ITEM_MAT_POISON_005.shop_data:
(Poisons) Stock Increase
Added by: Baby Wyrm

ITEM_MAT_POISON_006.description: Crystallized blood. It is a very powerful medicine when taken at the right dosage, but any mistake can be fatal. It is not sold to the public because of how difficult it is to use.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_006.gathering:
Magical Hidden Village: ★★★ bomb dark crystal
Den of the Wise: Monster Drop: - Shadow Commander
ITEM_MAT_POISON_006.name: Demon Blood
ITEM_MAT_POISON_006.shop_data:
(Poisons) Stock Increase
Added by: Underworld Crystal

ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_001.description: A plant found deep within the most secluded forest areas. Every part of it has some sort of medicinal use. It's considered to be a panacea, because it is effective against various diseases when taken as a decoction.
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_001.gathering: Memorial Garden: ★★★ staff bush at entrance
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_001.name: Forest Sage

ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_002.description: A powerful medicinal flower said to have the power to bring someone back from death's door. It requires processing by alchemy, so for regular folks it's nothing but a really rare flower.
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_002.gathering: Phantasm Forest: ★★★ sickle tall flowers in far south
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_002.name: Dunkelheit
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_002.shop_data:
(Elixirs) Stock Increase
Added by: Philosopher's Stone

ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_003.description: A pale powder with a bewitching effect. It's actually a collection of particles emitted by the flowers of the Bluewood. It is a difficult powder that can become a poison or a medicine, depending on how it is used.
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_003.gathering: Phantasm Forest: ★☆☆ staff fallen poison flower
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_003.name: Dream Powder
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_003.shop_data:
(Elixirs) Stock Increase
Added by: Dream Flower

ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_004.description: Holy water stored within an ancient altar. It has medicinal properties, but it's poisonous in its pure form. Its scent is so alluring, people sometimes drink it before they even realize it.
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_004.name: Divine Liquid
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_004.shop_data:
(Elixirs) Stock Increase
Added by: Holy Drop

ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_005.description: A huge flower that resembles the Sun. Nobody knows where it originally came from, and it's practically impossible to grow in captivity.
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_005.gathering: Central District: Gold Coin Exchange with Romy
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_005.name: Solflower

ITEM_MAT_SAND_001.description: Sand with a reddish hue. Unlike normal sand, it can perfectly retain moisture, so it always feels a little damp. It's often used for pottery or topsoil.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_001.name: Soft Sand

ITEM_MAT_SAND_002.description: Sand that can be collected by pulverizing rocks. It seems that ancient people filled the rocks with some kind of flammable liquid, so it smells like a volatile gas and burns up when lit.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_002.name: Burning Sand

ITEM_MAT_SAND_003.description: Sand that can be found at most beaches. It appears to be composed mostly of fossilized coral or shells. However, there is no way to know for sure.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_003.name: Ashen Sand

ITEM_MAT_SAND_004.description: Humus made of poisonous plants. The plants have decomposed naturally into soil, but since their toxins are still there, nothing will grow in it as it is.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_004.name: Polluted Humus

ITEM_MAT_SAND_005.description: A green-tinted soil. A closer look reveals tiny, glass-like stone fragments. It is most often found in ore-rich areas.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_005.name: Emerald Glass
ITEM_MAT_SAND_005.shop_data:
Adds Item: Ancient Branch
Added by: Lightning Sand

ITEM_MAT_SAND_006.description: Underwater soil filled with nutrients from a variety of organisms. It's a sign that the water is pure, so both the water and lifeforms in the water source where it can be collected are generally fit for consumption.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_006.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★☆☆ gather soil on lakebed
ITEM_MAT_SAND_006.name: Seafloor Soil
ITEM_MAT_SAND_006.shop_data:
Adds Item: Polishing Powder
Added by: Gelatin Powder

ITEM_MAT_SAND_007.description: A lump of mud. It's rich in ingredients, so it's a great material for alchemy, but it's not very pleasant to the touch or smell.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_007.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★★☆ gather soil on lakebed
ITEM_MAT_SAND_007.name: Black Muck
ITEM_MAT_SAND_007.shop_data:
Adds Item: Baby Wyrm
Added by: Alchemy Paint

ITEM_MAT_SAND_008.description: A gritty sand that swirls around due to its magnetic properties. Processing it can strengthen its magnetism, but nobody's found a good use for it yet.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_008.name: Vortex Sand

ITEM_MAT_STONE_001.description: A mysterious rock that tastes strangely sweet if you lick it. Some say that it is fossilized sugar from prehistoric times, but no amount of research can prove that it is anything but a rock. The reason for its sweetness is still a mystery.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_001.name: Nectar Rock

ITEM_MAT_STONE_002.description: A weathered and brittle ancient stone. It's too brittle to be used in anything, unless it is reprocessed with alchemy into a new building material.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_002.gathering: Highway: ★☆☆ axe stone blocks on southern hill
ITEM_MAT_STONE_002.name: Eroded Stone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_003.description: A stone with green and orange gradations. It's normally used for decoration, but it's valued among alchemists for its lightning and wind properties.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_003.gathering: Ancient Mana Workshop: ★☆☆ axe purple crystal in north
ITEM_MAT_STONE_003.name: Riverstone
ITEM_MAT_STONE_003.shop_data:
Adds Item: Degenesis Stone
Added by: Marblestone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_004.description: A stone with red and blue gradations. It's normally used for decoration, but it is valued among alchemists for its fire and ice properties.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_004.gathering: Glass Flower Forest: ★☆☆ axe yellow and blue crystal in southeast
ITEM_MAT_STONE_004.name: Blue Flame Riverstone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_005.description: A stone covered in moss, found near beaches and rivers. It's a common sight anywhere you go.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_005.gathering: Highway: ★☆☆ staff moss rock near fishing pond
ITEM_MAT_STONE_005.name: Waterside Moss Stone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_006.description: Stone material extracted from a white-hot meteorite. Even though it constantly gives off a bluish-white glow, lending it a ghostly tinge, it doesn't have any particular spiritual powers of note.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_006.gathering: Forest of Beginnings: ★★☆ axe on large rock pillar in far west
ITEM_MAT_STONE_006.name: Ethereal Stone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_007.description: A stone used in pillars in ancient buildings. Because it was processed to be used as a building material, it is already shaped and is easy to reuse.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_007.gathering: Forest of Beginnings: ★☆☆ staff broken pillar near boss
ITEM_MAT_STONE_007.name: Ancient Pillar
ITEM_MAT_STONE_007.shop_data:
(Stone) Stock Increase
Added by: Demolition Bomb

ITEM_MAT_STONE_008.description: It looks like a stone, but is actually a fossilized piece of coral. Its properties are completely different from a regular stone.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_008.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★☆☆ gather coral on center island
ITEM_MAT_STONE_008.name: Coral Stone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_009.description: An ore that contains mana. It's very light and crumbly, but it's actually a lot stronger than it looks. As such, it's difficult to process but can be used to create some tough items.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_009.gathering:
Schirm Marsh: ★★☆ axe silver crystals up north (1 element)
Crystal Cave of Oblivion: ★★☆ axe silver crystals (2 element)
ITEM_MAT_STONE_009.name: Arknite
ITEM_MAT_STONE_009.shop_data:
(Stone) Stock Increase
Added by: Ether Core

ITEM_MAT_ORE_001.description: Its outer shell is darkened by the cool air, but inside it still burns red-hot. It can sometimes spontaneously burst into flames.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_001.name: Crimson Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_002.description: An ore with high thermal conductivity. It's cool to the touch, but its crystalline core will instantly steal the heat from your hands if you touch it. Must be handled with gloves.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_002.gathering: Forest of Beginnings: ★☆☆ staff blue ore rock
ITEM_MAT_ORE_002.name: Aqua Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_003.description: A seemingly normal ore that hides the power of lightning. It's most often found at high areas where thunderstorms are common. Some believe the ore was transformed after being struck by lightning.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_003.gathering: Windmuhle Valley: ★☆☆ staff yellow rock in southwest
ITEM_MAT_ORE_003.name: Lightning Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_004.description: An ore with grooves that resemble spiraling winds. It contains a small amount of mana, and glows a pale green when wind blows at it.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_004.gathering: Forgotten Ruins: ★☆☆ staff certain blue ore rocks
ITEM_MAT_ORE_004.name: Wind Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_005.description: It is the world's most famous and common ore that everyone knows about. A versatile material that is cheap and easy to obtain, it can be combined with many other materials and is very easy to use in alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_005.gathering: Forgotten Ruins: ★☆☆ gather black ore rock in northwest
ITEM_MAT_ORE_005.name: Amatite Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_006.description: A plain, dark ore. When refined into a pure metal it reveals a bright green hue and is often used in armor and equipment. The refined version is hard and tough, but also heavy.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_006.gathering: Schirm Marsh: ★☆☆ axe Crystals near boss
ITEM_MAT_ORE_006.name: Pentanite

ITEM_MAT_ORE_007.description: An ore with a unique milky color. It can be refined into a metal, but can also be polished into a translucent white jewel.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_007.gathering: Forest of Beginnings: ★☆☆ bomb pillars near boss
ITEM_MAT_ORE_007.name: Mordenite

ITEM_MAT_ORE_008.description: A golden colored ore. Keep in mind, though, that it's not actually gold. It's quite soft in its purest form, but becomes extremely hard when combined with other metals.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_008.gathering:
Sand Beast's Den: ★★☆ staff rainbow crysal southwest
Central District: purchase after selling Amber Crystal
ITEM_MAT_ORE_008.name: Goldinite
ITEM_MAT_ORE_008.shop_data:
Adds Item: Goldoterion
Added by: Amber Crystal

ITEM_MAT_ORE_009.description: An ore with patchy black-and-white coloring. With a strong impact, it can be broken cleanly along the borders between colors, but each solid color part is quite hard and cannot be easily broken.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_009.gathering: Ancient Mana Workshop: ★★☆ axe purple crystal in north
ITEM_MAT_ORE_009.name: Degenesis Stone
ITEM_MAT_ORE_009.shop_data:
Adds Item: Creaminea
Added by: Marblestone

ITEM_MAT_ORE_010.description: A rainbow-colored ore that glows from within. Despite its appearance, it's actually one of the hardest known ores. In fact, it's nearly impossible to process using conventional means.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_010.gathering:
Sand Beast's Den: ★★★ axe rainbow crystal southwest
Central District: purchase after selling Samasten
ITEM_MAT_ORE_010.name: Septrin
ITEM_MAT_ORE_010.shop_data:
Adds Item: Grand Orgen
Added by Samasten

ITEM_MAT_ORE_011.description: A crystal that is absolutely impossible to process except through alchemy. By a skilled alchemist, it can be used as an ingredient in various ways, such as crushing, shaving, or melting.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_011.gathering: Central District: Gold Coin Exchange with Romy
ITEM_MAT_ORE_011.name: Eternal Crystal

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_001.description: A collection of transparent stone fragments. It includes a variety of materials, including rare and expensive jewels.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_001.name: Small Crystals

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_002.description: As the name implies, it is an unidentified gemstone. With so many different materials mixed in, nobody can say for sure what it's made of. It could be a gem, or it could be a stone.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_002.name: Unknown Gemstone

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_003.description: An incredibly rare white sphere found only in giant bivalve shellfish that dwell in relatively shallow waters. It's quite beautiful, so people treat it like a gemstone.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_003.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★☆☆ gather clams on lakebed
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_003.name: Shell Pearl

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_004.description: A crystallized fragment occasionally found in amber. Some crystals are contaminated with foreign substances such as insects and plants, and it's not uncommon for them to be more expensive than the clear ones.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_004.name: Amber Crystal

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_005.description: A stone with a high metal content. It appears to be hard, but is actually softer than other natural stones. It can be turned into a powder to make it responsive to heat and fire, so it must be handled with care.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_005.gathering: Ancient Mana Workshop: ★☆☆ bomb magma rocks
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_005.name: Magnemarmor

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_006.description: A crystallized segment extracted from a branch of a massive tree. It is believed that it's the liquid that was sucked up by the roots of the tree and crystallized in the branches, but the truth is unknown.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_006.gathering:
Water Spirit's Sanctuary: ★★☆ sickle gemmed log
Central District: purchase after selling Millenium Tree
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_006.name: Holy Arbor Crystal

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_007.description: A gemstone that was processed to reflect various colors depending on the angle of light. However, it can only be created by seasoned artisans, making it a rare and expensive item.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_007.gathering:
Sand Beast's Den: ★★★ bomb rainbow crystal in southwest
Crystal Cave of Oblivion: Monster Drop: - Boulder Soldier
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_007.name: Rainbow Gemstone

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_008.description: A small piece of amber. It's not highly valued as a jewel due to its size, which means it can be used as an alchemy material without reservation.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_008.name: Amber Fragment

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_009.description: A piece of coral that glows in water. It won't glow when it's dry, but can still be processed into expensive accessories.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_009.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★★☆ gather coral on central island
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_009.name: Glowing Coral

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_010.description: A fragment of a gigantic meteor. They always come in pairs, and are connected no matter how far they are from each other. Some say you can use them to teleport...maybe.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_010.gathering: Submerged Lower Town: ★☆☆ axe yellow and blue crystal
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_010.name: Star Fragment

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_011.description: An ore found in the Oren lands in the Underworld. It's been tainted by the Philuscha, causing it to emit a corrosive miasma. Just touching it will fill you with toxins.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_011.gathering: Ethereal Dragon's Coffin: Monster Drop: - any philuscha
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_011.name: Underworld Crystal

ITEM_MAT_POWDER_001.description: Wood that has been dried and broken into small pieces. It burns easily, and can be scattered across an open area to facilitate a dust explosion.
ITEM_MAT_POWDER_001.name: Dried Lumber

ITEM_MAT_POWDER_002.description: Black sand that smokes and burns when placed near an open flame. It's difficult to use so you will need to be creative, like putting it in a container.
ITEM_MAT_POWDER_002.gathering: Highway: ★★☆ bomb fallen logs in north
ITEM_MAT_POWDER_002.name: Flaming Black Sand

ITEM_MAT_POWDER_003.description: Crushed lava ore in a powdered form. Even as a powder, it's still magma and may suddenly combust if left unattended. It will be a disaster if you let it get scattered by the wind.
ITEM_MAT_POWDER_003.gathering: Ancient Mana Workshop: ★☆☆ axe magma rock
ITEM_MAT_POWDER_003.name: Magma Powder

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_001.description: Just a piece of paper. The only use for the paper is to burn it, but since the paper itself is relatively valuable, it can't be considered trash.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_001.gathering: Forgotten Ruins: ★☆☆ gather paper on ground
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_001.name: Scrap Paper

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_002.description: Bark that was scrapped from a tree. It is dry and burns well, so it is often used as a fuel substitute.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_002.name: Flammable Bark

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_003.description: Bark from a Palma tree. It's more fibrous than normal tree bark, and is easier to separate into thin sheets, making it much more flammable.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_003.gathering: Submerged Lower Town: ★★☆ sickle palm tree
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_003.name: Palma Bark

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_004.description: Oil extracted from plant materials. It is often used in cooking. It is healthier than animal-based oils, but some people don't like it due to its distinct smell.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_004.name: Natural Oil

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_005.description: Although it is charcoal, it rarely catches fire when burned. As such, it's not very useful as a fuel source, but is often used to make smoke signals.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_005.name: Smokey Charcoal
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_005.shop_data:
(Fuel) Stock Increase
Added by: Gunpowder Base

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_006.description: A remarkably black charcoal made by burning Palma wood at a very high temperature. It burns very well and is excellent as a fuel, but it also has an effect of absorbing even the most powerful of odors.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_006.gathering: Submerged Lower Town: ★★★ bomb palm tree
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_006.name: Palma Charcoal
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_006.shop_data:
Adds Item: Werder Nut
Added by: Blue Flame Ember

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_007.description: A kind of coconut that grows in swamps. The oil it contains can be used as fuel, medicine, or food. The fruit itself is tough but still edible, although most people don't enjoy its taste.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_007.name: Fuel Coconut
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_007.shop_data:
(Fuel) Stock Increase
Added by: Fire Seeds

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_008.description: A fire said to burn for all eternity. No matter where it is, no matter what you do, it will always burn. Perhaps that means there is more than one place where it burns now.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_008.gathering: Central District: Gold Coin Exchange with Romy
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_008.name: Eternal Fire

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_009.description: An expensive yellowish oil. It's slowly excreted by rocks in a specific cave over a long period of time, and its scent and flavor are top-notch. Only a selected few know where the cave is located.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_009.name: Amber Oil
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_009.shop_data:
Adds Item: Amber Fly
Added by: Golden Oil

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_001.description: A piece of meat that was obtained from a beast. For ordinary folks it is better to buy it in a store, because the preparations such as bloodletting require specialized skills.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_001.name: Beast Meat

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_002.description: Meat from livestock bred specifically for consumption. It can be harvested both from animals and certain monsters. This meat is tastier and more nutritious than Beast Meat, and adventurers love it.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_002.name: Fresh Meat

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_003.description: It's impossible to tell what laid this egg. A fertilized egg has never been found, so in all likelihood nobody will ever know. It can be consumed.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_003.name: Unknown Egg

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_004.description: A fruit that's filled mostly with oil. Eating it will make you sick. It can be crushed to extract the oil from it.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_004.name: Oil Tree Fruit

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_005.description: An extremely sweet fruit. Some people consider the juice a gift from heaven. There are regions that believe this fruit can come flowing down the river.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_005.name: Nectar Fruit

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_006.description: A simple potato that grows in the wild. They're usually quite small compared to the plump, delicious ones grown on farms, but it does fill you up.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_006.name: Wild Potato

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_007.description: A common forest bean. It's very nutritious, and can be fermented and stored for a long time. However, many people don't like it because of its unique texture and smell, and the way it pulls sticky strings.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_007.gathering: Memorial Garden: ★★☆ staff vase at entrance
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_007.name: Portpea

ITEM_MAT_NUT_001.description: A fruit with a hard shell that grows on Palma trees. The sweet juice within is very popular among children. However, because its shell is so hard, there are many accidents where people have been injured by falling fruit.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_001.gathering: Submerged Lower Town: ★★☆ staff palm tree
ITEM_MAT_NUT_001.name: Palma Fruit

ITEM_MAT_NUT_002.description: A type of wild berry. In some regions, it's known as the Chiko Fruit. It's naturally tangy, but it becomes much sweeter when crushed and cooked, making it a popular dessert ingredient.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_002.gathering: Memorial Garden: ★☆☆ staff vase at entrance
ITEM_MAT_NUT_002.name: Fresh Berry

ITEM_MAT_NUT_003.description: A highly nutritious nut. It can be eaten as is, but due to the high fat content it's often refined down into an oil.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_003.gathering: Windmuhle Valley: ★☆☆ staff bush in northeast
ITEM_MAT_NUT_003.name: Werder Nut
ITEM_MAT_NUT_003.shop_data:
(Fruits) Stock Increase
Added by: Palma Charcoal

ITEM_MAT_NUT_004.description: This one tree produces three different tasting fruits, so you can't tell what it will taste like until you try it. They are all relatively tasty and popular with children and travelers alike.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_004.gathering: Highway: ★☆☆ staff berry bush in farm
ITEM_MAT_NUT_004.name: Fortune Fruit
ITEM_MAT_NUT_004.shop_data:
(Fruits) Stock Increase
Added by: Medicinal Cocktail

ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_001.description: A beehive filled with sweet honey and bee larvae. Honey is high in nutrition, so it is popular among travelers, but there can be terrible consequences when the gatherer is stung while trying to get the honey.
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_001.name: Beehive

ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_002.description: A silver-tinted beehive. They tend to contain even more honey than normal hives, and most connoisseurs agree that the honey has much more depth. However, since the color is not appetizing, it's not very popular.
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_002.name: Silver Beehive

ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_003.description: This golden beehive is extremely rare and highly sought after. The hive itself is made of honey. Alchemists would much rather use this high-quality material in their alchemy than simply eat it, but it feels like a waste.
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_003.name: Gold Beehive
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_003.shop_data:
(Beehive) Stock Increase
Added by: Amber Fragment

ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_004.description: A type of beehive once thought to have gone extinct. Its honey is much more nutritious than normal, but it also oxidizes much faster, so it can be extremely difficult to process.
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_004.gathering: Windmuhle Valley: ★★☆ gather beehive on right before bridge
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_004.name: Ancient Beehive
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_004.shop_data:
Adds Item: Queen Spider Web
Added by: Holy Tree Leaf

ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_005.description: It's actually multiple spherical beehives stuck together. There are holes in all directions, allowing worker bees easy access. It's often found in caves and other sheltered areas.
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_005.gathering: Windmuhle Valley: ★★★ gather beehive on right before bridge
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_005.name: Honey Ball
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_005.shop_data:
(Beehive) Stock Increase
Added by Silver Beehive

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_001.description: A mushroom that grows only on Eiche trees. It's easy to tell apart from poisonous varieties, and is quite tasty when roasted. It's very popular among both casual travelers and dedicated adventurers.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_001.gathering: Forest of Beginnings: ★☆☆ gather yellow mushroom
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_001.name: Eicheloa

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_002.description: Mushrooms that grow together in large clusters. They're edible, but some of the mushroom members are more nutritious than others, so these are best for those who value quantity over quality.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_002.gathering: Central District: ★☆☆ staff barrel near atelier entrance
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_002.name: Mushroom Colony

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_003.description: A larger than average mushroom found in the Pixie Forest. It has an extremely thick stalk, so you'll need an axe if you want to gather it.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_003.gathering: Schirm Marsh: ★☆☆ axe large mushrooms at entrance
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_003.name: Utopiechampignon
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_003.shop_data:
Adds Item: Ancient Bug
Added by: Water Holy Branch

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_004.description: A mushroom with a cap shaped like a crown. It's very rare, and said to have a marvelous scent and flavor. Some people even refer to it as the king of mushrooms. Due to its rarity, some grow it as a decoration.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_004.gathering: Forest of Beginnings: ★★★ gather yellow mushroom
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_004.name: Golden Crown
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_004.shop_data:
Adds Item: Baron's Crown
Added by: Crown Shellfish

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_005.description: A rare mushroom that grows underwater. It's mostly water, and has a jelly-like texture. As a result, it doesn't really have any flavor.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_005.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★★☆ gather submerged log northeast of lake
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_005.name: Jellyfish Mushroom
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_005.shop_data:
(Mushrooms) Stock Increase
Added by: Puni Leather

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_006.description: An extremely rare mushroom. It gets its name from its coloration, spotted and blue as the night's sky.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_006.gathering: Forest of Beginnings: ★★☆ gather yellow mushroom
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_006.name: Dusk Mushroom
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_006.shop_data:
(Mushrooms) Stock Increase
Added by: Poison Cube

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_007.description: A dangerous mushroom that causes various negative effects when ingested. It grows in decayed lands, and multiplies fast enough that it can easily cover an entire area.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_007.gathering: Slumbering River Valley: ★☆☆ gather purple mushroom in the northwest
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_007.name: Danger Mushroom
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_007.shop_data:
(Mushrooms) Stock Increase
Added by: Taboo Drop

ITEM_MAT_FISH_001.description: A freshwater fish found in rivers and lakes. It can be caught anywhere, so it is eaten throughout the nation and is a common sight on the dinner table.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_001.gathering: Central District: ★☆☆ staff barrel near atelier entrance
ITEM_MAT_FISH_001.name: Sardine

ITEM_MAT_FISH_002.description: A fish with fins that look like wings. It can even leave the water to glide through the air. Of course, it can also swim like a normal fish when it wants to.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_002.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★☆☆ gather bush on lakebed
ITEM_MAT_FISH_002.name: Exofish

ITEM_MAT_FISH_003.description: A particularly large and delicious fish. It's also quite heavy, so you'll need a strong, durable fishing pole to catch it—or a fishing boat with a thick net.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_003.name: Seriole

ITEM_MAT_FISH_004.description: A shellfish commonly found near beaches. Roast it over an open flame and dig in for a delicious meal.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_004.gathering: Central District: ★★☆ staff barrel near atelier entrance
ITEM_MAT_FISH_004.name: Pourpremoule

ITEM_MAT_FISH_005.description: A small crab that lives on beaches and other waterside areas. It can grow to a respectable size, and the claws of the bigger ones are sharp and powerful enough to cause harm.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_005.name: Crab

ITEM_MAT_FISH_006.description: A fish with a head like a giant hammer. It's extremely aggressive and will happily attack humans. It's also not particularly tasty, so fishermen mostly do whatever they can to avoid it.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_006.name: Mace Fish
ITEM_MAT_FISH_006.shop_data:
(Seafood) Stock Increase
Added by: Demon Claws

ITEM_MAT_FISH_007.description: A fish that hasn't changed or evolved for tens of thousands of years. Its form is extremely different from any other known fish, and it is said that there are only a few specimens left in the wild.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_007.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★★★ gather bush on NW lakebed
ITEM_MAT_FISH_007.name: Myria Fish
ITEM_MAT_FISH_007.shop_data:
(Seafood) Stock Increase
Added by: Amber Fly

ITEM_MAT_FISH_008.description: The lord of all fish that live in lakes. Of course, despite its name and reputation, many more than one exist. The largest one is sometimes called the "True Master".
ITEM_MAT_FISH_008.name: Lake Master
ITEM_MAT_FISH_008.shop_data:
(Seafood) Stock Increase
Added by: Ancient Bug

ITEM_MAT_FISH_009.description: A collection of pretty seashells of a variety of colors. They are popular as fashion accessories, but can also be melted or crushed and used in alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_009.gathering: Central District: ★★★ staff barrel near atelier
ITEM_MAT_FISH_009.name: Pretty Shells

ITEM_MAT_FISH_010.description: A fish covered in spikes. Normally the spikes lay flat, but when it feels threatened, it will puff itself up and make the spikes jut out. They are edible, but due to being poisonous, a special license is required to prepare them.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_010.name: Spikey

ITEM_MAT_FISH_011.description: A starfish with spikes protruding from its back. Some people think it looks like it's carrying an Uni, hence the name.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_011.name: Uni Starfish

ITEM_MAT_FISH_012.description: An amphibious horseshoe crab. It gets its name from the two demonic-looking horns on its shell. If you boil it, you'll know it's ready to eat once it turns red.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_012.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★★★ gather junk on lakebed
ITEM_MAT_FISH_012.name: Demon Crab

ITEM_MAT_FISH_013.description: A nautilus with a large, tough conical shell. It's also especially beautiful, making it a popular accessory component.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_013.name: Dragonpalace Nautilus
ITEM_MAT_FISH_013.shop_data:
(Seafood) Stock Increase
Added by: Expiation Worm

ITEM_MAT_FISH_014.description: A kind of shellfish that looks like a crown. It filters whatever water it's in, so wherever you find it, you'll know the water is clean. Roast it up nice for a delightful treat.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_014.gathering: Schirm Marsh: ★★☆ staff on vase, just east of western fishing point
ITEM_MAT_FISH_014.name: Crown Shellfish
ITEM_MAT_FISH_014.shop_data:
Adds Item: Golden Crown
Added by Super Pure Water

ITEM_MAT_FISH_015.description: An elusive fish found only deep within ancient ruins. It was able to survive until this day by living quietly, out of reach of humans. It is an endangered species, but it is very tasty when it is boiled.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_015.name: Imperial Fish
ITEM_MAT_FISH_015.shop_data:
Adds Item: Kaiser Cape
Added by: Divine Fishing Rod

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_001.description: An insect with a pattern on its back that looks like seven stars. It prefers sunlight, and can often be spotted hanging out on a leaf sunbathing. But it is actually more active at night.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_001.gathering: Forgotten Ruins: ★☆☆ staff crates in northeast
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_001.name: Seven Stars

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_002.description: An ant that collects nectar and stores it in its body. As such, it can often be found near sweet things. It's said that they taste sweet, but most people aren't too eager to find out for themselves.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_002.name: Honey Ant

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_003.description: A flying insect with a strangely inflated tail that glows like a lantern. It is said that its glowing tail is what created the image of the human soul.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_003.gathering:
Forest of Beginnings: ★★★ net large flowers in center-north area
Farming District: purchase from bandits
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_003.name: Lantern Fly

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_004.description: A bee with a red pattern. They are carnivorous and venomous enough to take down not only other insects but also some small animals. There are even reported cases of them attacking and killing humans.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_004.name: Rose Bee

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_005.description: A massive insect protected by a hard exoskeleton. Its shell is thick enough to withstand most animal bites and not be crushed when a child steps on it.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_005.gathering: Abandoned Mine Railway: ★★☆ net purple plant
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_005.name: Giant Beetle

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_006.description: A bright red insect. It can both fly very fast and stay still in the air, so you need to be clever if you want to catch it. It's red, but it doesn't have any fire-related abilities.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_006.name: Bomb Dragoon

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_007.description: An earthworm that consumes toxins in the soil. A lot of people don't like them because they look disgusting, but gardeners and farmers cherish them as beneficial bugs.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_007.name: Expiation Worm

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_008.description: An insect that looks like a shining jewel. But make no mistake—it's still just a bug. Most people know the story of the man who attached this bug to a ring to give to his fiancée, only to have the wedding called off.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_008.name: Amber Fly
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_008.shop_data:
Adds Item: Myria Fish
Added by: Golden Oil

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_009.description: A butterfly with deep blue wings. Its blue wings are made from a material close to glass or gemstones, which makes its flight pattern a little awkward. But because of these hard wings, it can also glide at an amazing speed.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_009.gathering: Spirit Tree's Resting Place: ★☆☆ net tall flowers east of lake
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_009.name: Lapis Papillion
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_009.shop_data:
(Bugs) Stock Increase
Added by: Virgo Requiem Flower

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_010.description: An insect that looks like a tiny dragon. Despite its name, it can neither fly nor breathe fire, and tends to flee at the sight of humans.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_010.name: Baby Wyrm
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_010.shop_data:
Adds Item: Dragon Meat
Added by: Alchemy Paint

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_011.description: A golden bug that has three horns. Some people consider it the king of bugs, but it doesn't actually get very big. When it gets dragged into fights between bugs, it usually loses pretty quickly.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_011.gathering:
Water Spirit's Sanctuary: ★★★ net gemmed logs
Spirit's Tomb: Monster Drop: - Horned Demon
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_011.name: Trihorn
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_011.shop_data:
(Bugs) Stock Increase
Added by: Golden Seeds

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_012.description: A bug that hasn't changed at all for untold centuries. It's as beautiful as any jewel, and in fact is often treated like a type of gemstone.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_012.name: Ancient Bug
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_012.shop_data:
Adds Item: Lake Master
Added by: Traveler's Water Orb

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_013.description: A bug found only in pitch-black places where no light can reach, like deep water or ancient ruins. It glows with a pale blue-white light, so you can spot it even in complete darkness.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_013.name: Spirit Isopod
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_013.shop_data:
(Bugs) Stock Increase
Added by: Master Bug Net

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_001.description: A huge and sturdy spider thread. It's surprisingly difficult to break, so it's used in a variety of products. This thread is collected from abandoned spider webs.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_001.name: Restraint Silk

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_002.description: A plant vine that doesn't tear very easily. It's also flexible and fire-resistant, so it's used in a large number of products.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_002.gathering: Highway: ★★☆ gather berry bush in farm
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_002.name: Tough Vine

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_003.description: This ivy lives for hundreds of years wrapping itself around large trees. Because it wraps itself very tightly around the trees, some even mistake it for a part of the tree.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_003.gathering: Water Spirit's Sanctuary: ★☆☆ sickle gemmed log
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_003.name: Arbor Ivy
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_003.shop_data:
Adds Item: Reinforced Zettel
Added by: Ancient Solution

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_004.description: A plant that grows puffy white cotton pods. The cotton is harvested and used to make thread and cloth—although it takes a lot to make even a single item.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_004.name: Cotton Grass

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_005.description: A web spun by a giant spider queen. It's much tougher than normal webbing, and becomes very pleasant when wet. Just make sure the queen isn't around when you gather it, or else...
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_005.gathering:
Abandoned Mine Railway: ★★★ gather cobweb
Central District: purchase after selling Ancient Beehive
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_005.name: Queen Spider Web
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_005.shop_data:
(Threads) Stock Increase
Added by: Ancient Beehive

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_006.description: A thread created by processing a giant spider's silk. The long, fine threads are easy to dye but hard to mass-produce, so it's fairly expensive. Most people don't realize it comes from spiders...
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_006.gathering:
Phantasm Forest: ★★☆ gather cobweb
Central District: purchase after selling Holy Arbor Crystal
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_006.name: Angel Silk
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_006.shop_data:
(Threads) Stock Increase
Added by: Holy Arbor Crystal

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_001.description: A large tree found in all regions of the world. It's extremely hard and difficult to process, although it's still softer than metal. As such, it's a fairly common construction material throughout the land.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_001.name: Eiche

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_002.description: A durable log that won't break no matter how many people stand on it. It can be cut to shape and used as construction timber.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_002.name: Tough Log

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_003.description: A log completely covered in moss. No one knows for sure, but perhaps it once was a tree that fell into the water and floated in it for a very long time.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_003.gathering:
Highway: ★★★ axe fallen log
Star Guardian Lake: ★★☆ gather log on lakebed
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_003.name: Mossy Driftwood

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_004.description: A branch that's been broken off of a massive holy tree. It's incredibly stiff and tough, and very difficult to process. Weapons or items using this lumber will be traded at a premium.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_004.gathering:
Water Spirit's Sanctuary: ★★★ axe gemmed log
Central District: purchase after selling Sunlight Soil
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_004.name: Holy Arbor Branch
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_004.shop_data:
(Lumber) Stock Increase
Added by Sunlight Soil

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_005.description: A tree that grows in warmer southern regions. It has extremely large leaves but almost no branches, and tends to have unbelievably tough fruits.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_005.gathering:
Submerged Lower Town: ★★★ axe palm tree
Central District: purchase after selling Mossy Driftwood
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_005.name: Palma

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_006.description: A chunk of wood that fossilized after many years. It's basically as hard as stone.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_006.name: Fossil Tree
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_006.shop_data:
Adds Item: Dragon Bone
Added by: Mana-Eater Branch

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_007.description: A branch of a greedy tree that grows by feeding on the fire Fairystones. Because it feeds on fire mana, it is highly resistant to fire. It is often used to make fire-resistant items.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_007.gathering: Fire People's Village: ★☆☆ axe gemmed log
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_007.name: Mana-Eater Branch
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_007.shop_data:
Adds Item: Fossil Tree
Added by: Witch's Potion

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_008.description: Wood gathered from a tree that's been growing for tens of thousands of years. It's highly flammable, so it makes for good fuel. But it feels wrong to burn something so old and precious...
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_008.gathering:
Windmuhle Valley: ★★★ axe sapling
Central District: purchase after selling Yugdore Water
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_008.name: Ancient Log
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_008.shop_data:
Adds Item: Ancient Beehive
Added by: Holy Tree Leaf

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_009.description: A remnant from the time when the areas around Ashra-am Baird were being developed. Although it's small and made of wood, it's surprisingly sturdy and useful.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_009.gathering: Memorial Garden: ★★☆ gather junk near shop
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_009.name: Wooden Cog

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_010.description: It is the same kind of a tree as the great old tree that grows in a great forest of a distant land. It's very strong and useful, but very difficult to obtain, so make sure not to waste it.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_010.gathering: Central District: Gold Coin Exchange with Romy
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_010.name: Millennial Tree

ITEM_MAT_GAS_001.description: A plant with leaves that resemble bird wings. They are very light and are often carried around by the wind.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_001.gathering: Memorial Garden: ★☆☆ sickle bush at entrance
ITEM_MAT_GAS_001.name: Wing Plant

ITEM_MAT_GAS_002.description: Bubbles extracted from Bubble Grass. Even though they will pop if you grip them with force, they won't break if you just touch them normally, so they are relatively easy to collect.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_002.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★☆☆ net on large blue flowers
ITEM_MAT_GAS_002.name: Sky Bubble

ITEM_MAT_GAS_003.description: A mushroom that looks like it's already been cooked. But it's only colored that way, so eating it raw will make you sick. It's mostly hollow and has a light texture.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_003.name: Crispy Mushroom

ITEM_MAT_GAS_004.description: A toxic gas emitted by rotten wood. It has an obvious purple color, and you need to be extremely careful not to breathe it in, or you will feel sick for days.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_004.gathering: Glass Flower Forest: ★☆☆ bomb rafflesia in southeast
ITEM_MAT_GAS_004.name: Rotwood Miasma

ITEM_MAT_GAS_005.description: A branch of a tree that grows underwater. It supplies oxygen to the surrounding organisms by releasing it from its branches, but can only produce oxygen while in the water.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_005.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★★☆ gather bush on lakebed
ITEM_MAT_GAS_005.name: Water Holy Branch
ITEM_MAT_GAS_005.shop_data:
Adds Item: Utopiechampignon
Added by: Traveler's Water Orb

ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_001.description: A mysterious blue sphere found within Blue Punis. It's sleek, smooth, and partially transparent.
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_001.name: Blue Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_002.description: A mysterious green sphere found within Green Punis. It's sleek, smooth, and partially transparent.
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_002.gathering: Forest of Beginnings: Monster Drop: - Green Puni
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_002.name: Green Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_003.description: A mysterious red sphere found within Red Punis. It's sleek, smooth, and partially transparent.
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_003.gathering: Memorial Garden: Monster Drop: - Red Puni
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_003.name: Red Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_004.description: A mysterious black sphere found within Black Punis. It's sleek, smooth, and partially transparent.
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_004.gathering: Submerged Lower Town: Monster Drop: - Black Puni
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_004.name: Black Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_005.description: A mysterious silver sphere found within Silver Punis. It's sleek, smooth, and partially transparent.
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_005.gathering: Fire People's Village: Monster Drop: - Silver Puni
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_005.name: Silver Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_006.description: A mysterious golden sphere found within Gold Punis. It's sleek, smooth, and partially transparent.
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_006.gathering: Abandoned Mine Railway: Monster Drop: - Gold Puni
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_006.name: Gold Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_007.description: A mysterious pink sphere found within Pink Punis. It's sleek, smooth, and partially transparent. It smells vaguely like cherry blossoms.
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_007.gathering: Glass Flower Forest: Monster Drop: - Flower Puni
ITEM_MAT_PUNIPUNI_007.name: Pink Puniball

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_001.description: A pelt of a wild animal. It cannot be used as it is, and needs to be tanned before it can be processed.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_001.name: Animal Hide

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_002.description: A pelt of a mythical beast. It's a prized material because the fur is very soft and fine, but it will be ruined if it is not tanned and prepared properly.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_002.gathering:
Windmuhle Valley: ★★★ sickle skeleton
Glass Flower Forest: Monster Drop: - Night Hunter
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_002.name: Mythical Hide
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_002.shop_data:
Adds Item: Master Leather
Added by: Ancient Blue Water

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_003.description: A bone of a gigantic animal, certainly something much larger than a human. It is as hard as metal, and is a useful synthesis material.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_003.name: Large Bone

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_004.description: A fossil of a giant prehistoric creature. It lived on the land so long ago, its bones have turned to stone. It's difficult to see what it looked like only from the fossils.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_004.name: Beast Fossil

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_005.description: A feather of a white bird. It can often be found in the Academy District, and although it's just an ordinary feather, some believe that if you find one, it will bring you good luck for the rest of the day.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_005.name: Blessed Feather

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_006.description: A fossil of an aquatic creature. It's larger than a human, but somehow is also both lighter and sturdier than human bones.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_006.gathering: Submerged Lower Town: Monster Drop: - Hide Shark
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_006.name: Water Beast Fossil
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_006.shop_data:
Adds Item: Torch Grass
Added by: Beast Fossil

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_007.description: A scale of a beast that swims in the sea. Lost scales frequently wash ashore after some vigorous swimming. While they are beautiful, they are pretty easy to find, so you can't expect to make much money off them.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_007.gathering: Submerged Lower Town: Monster Drop: - Hide Shark
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_007.name: Water Beast Scale
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_007.shop_data:
Adds Item: Blue Herb
Added by: Coral Stone

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_008.description: A wing of a bat that lives in caves and ruins. This bat feeds on insects and drinks polluted water, so it's fairly toxic to humans.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_008.gathering: Abandoned Eanesta Mines: ★★☆ gather bird nest
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_008.name: Cave Bat Wing

ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_009.description: A magnificent horn of an adult goat at the end of its life. There is a tradition among goat owners to cut and keep these as a keepsake.
ITEM_MAT_ANIMAL_009.name: Goat Horn

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_001.description: A stone fragment filled with mana. It glows and is often used as a light source in homes. It is still unknown how these stones filled with mana came into being.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_001.gathering: Forgotten Ruins: ★☆☆ staff crystals in northwest
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_001.name: Fairystone Fragment

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_002.description: A jet-black crystal. Despite its appearance, it doesn't have any dark powers. Who decided that the mysterious power of the crystal must be dark just because it's black?
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_002.name: Dark Crystal Fragment

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_003.description: A crystal that glows bluish-white. People used to think it had holy powers, hence the name. But although it is mystical, there's nothing particularly holy about it.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_003.gathering: Highway: ★☆☆ staff crystals in fishing pond
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_003.name: Holy Stone Fragment

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_004.description: A part of a book written by an ancient mage. The book is about the study of magic, and even this small piece is filled with mana.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_004.gathering: Forgotten Ruins: ★★☆ gather paper on ground
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_004.name: Magic Tome Piece

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_005.description: A book written by an ancient mage. Even those who have no magic abilities can feel the mana coursing through it. However, this still won't allow them to use magic.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_005.gathering: Memorial Garden: ★★★ gather book pile in west
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_005.name: Old Magic Tome

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_006.description: A leaf from a crystallized branch of a massive tree. It's just a leaf, but since it's a leaf of a holy tree, it seems to have some mystical power.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_006.gathering:
Water Spirit's Sanctuary: ★★★ bomb gemmed log
Phantasm Forest: Monster Drop: - Blazing Maiden
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_006.name: Holy Tree Leaf

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_007.description: A mysterious object found mainly in ruins. It's slightly charged with both electricity and mana, but nobody knows what it was originally used for. Perhaps it's some sort of a power source...?
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_007.gathering: Windmuhle Valley: ★★☆ gather junk in northeast
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_007.name: Abyss Bolt

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_008.description: A round tablet etched with mysterious writing. Nobody knows what it says, but the tablet vibrates from time to time. If someone could translate the text, maybe it would explain why it does that.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_008.gathering:
Fire People's Village: ★★★ axe boulder
Garden of Reincarnation Spirit beast mining
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_008.name: Round Tablet

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_009.description: A fossil of some prehistoric creature not found in any book known to man. It seems to contain a lot of valuable properties.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_009.gathering: Crystal Cave of Oblivion: ★☆☆ gather Skeleton
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_009.name: Ancient Fossil

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_010.description: A dangerous sap that can melt absolutely anything. However, it also has a very sweet fragrance that attracts bugs, animals, and even humans. One sip will be enough to cost a person their life.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_010.gathering:
Glass Flower Forest: ★★★ sickle rafflesia in southeast
Spirit's Tomb: Monster Drop: - Shadow Eater
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_010.name: Tempting Sap

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_011.description: A frost pillar tinged with mana, found at the bottom of the Dragonbone Valley. It emits cold air and can't be melted easily. Its name comes from the white moon of the Underworld.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_011.gathering: Cold Moon Cavern: ★☆☆ staff vase on altar
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_011.name: White Moon Frost

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_012.description: An elusive flower rarely found anywhere outside of crypts or cemeteries. Its faint bluish-white blossom is said to console the dead.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_012.name: Virgo Requiem Flower

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_013.description: A Fairystone fragment charged with mana that burns anything it touches. It's found in the Ancient Mana Workshop, and once lit, the Fairystone mana will continue to burn for all eternity.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_013.name: Ember Stone

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_014.description: At first glance, it looks like gold dust, but upon closer inspection, you will realize that it's neither sand nor metal, and the light is emitted by some mysterious force.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_014.gathering: Central District: Gold Coin Exchange with Romy
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_014.name: Shining Sand

ITEM_MAT_METAL_001.description: A sword that's completely rusted due to years of neglect. It could still be reforged into a new blade, but will be more useful if it's broken down for materials.
ITEM_MAT_METAL_001.name: Rusted Sword

ITEM_MAT_METAL_002.description: A pile of broken tools. It's unclear if they were discarded because they were broken, or if they degraded after being discarded. It is impossible to use them like this, but they can be reused for materials.
ITEM_MAT_METAL_002.gathering: Windmuhle Valley: ★☆☆ gather junk in northeast
ITEM_MAT_METAL_002.name: Broken Tools

ITEM_MAT_METAL_003.description: A sword that was wielded against the Philuscha long ago. It's far more ancient than even the Klint Kingdom, so its greatest value today might be as a museum piece.
ITEM_MAT_METAL_003.gathering: Windmuhle Valley: ★★★ gather junk in northeast
ITEM_MAT_METAL_003.name: Ancient Sword

ITEM_MAT_METAL_004.description: A piece of metal whose original purpose isn't immediately obvious. It's extremely hard, and since it's so difficult to refine, people have had a tough time finding a use for it.
ITEM_MAT_METAL_004.gathering: Garden of Reincarnation Spirit beast mining
ITEM_MAT_METAL_004.name: Mysterious Metal Shard

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_001.description: A dorsal fin that can be taken from a monster. It becomes edible after processing, but since it takes a long time and a lot of skill, it's considered to be a luxury food item.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_001.gathering: Submerged Lower Town: Monster Drop: - Hide Shark
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_001.name: Beast Fin

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_002.description: A hard outer shell of a monster. It can deflect claws and fangs of other monsters, as well as many human weapons, so it can be processed to become a very useful material.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_002.gathering: Lonely Residence: Monster Drop: - any Beetle-type enemy
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_002.name: Beast Shell

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_003.description: Scales from a monster. They are thin compared to shells, but are very hard and can be used for many purposes. They are very difficult to collect from monsters.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_003.gathering: Den of the Wise: Monster Drop: - Pile Bunker
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_003.name: Beast Scales

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_004.description: An exceedingly large Puniball. It's so big that if you leave it in the room, someone might confuse it for an actual Puni.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_004.name: Giant Puniball

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_005.description: This is thought to be the heart of a golem and can be found in its center. It may look like some sort of gem, so people sometimes mistake it as such when they find it the remains of a golem.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_005.gathering: Crystal Cave of Oblivion: Monster Drop: - Colossus Golem
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_005.name: Golem Core

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_006.description: The spirit held by a knight's ghost. It kept it even after it turned into a monster. There's no doubt that if you use it as a material, it will unleash a strong mystical power.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_006.gathering: Fairystone Eater's Domain: Monster Drop: - Great Guardian
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_006.name: Heroic Spirit

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_007.description: Claws from a fierce monster. They are extremely sharp, and can take out both humans and other monsters with a single blow.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_007.gathering: Schirm Marsh: Monster Drop: - Mother Weasel
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_007.name: Giant Claws

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_008.description: A special scale that can grow on wyvern leaders on very rare occasions. It is said that a dragon's power is stored in it, and when it gets angry, it draws out its mighty power from it.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_008.gathering: Flowerpatch Cape: Monster Drop: - Cloud Liner
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_008.name: Inverted Scale

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_009.description: A horn adornment owned by pixie leaders. When a large fairy grows up, this horn ornament grows together with its horns. Even if it is broken, it will naturally grow back.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_009.gathering: Forest of Beginnings: Monster Drop: - Elder Fairy
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_009.name: Fairy Horn Adornment

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_010.description: A useful material gathered from sheep-type monsters. It's much warmer than normal wool, so it's often used as insulation. One drawback is that it builds up static electricity very easily.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_010.name: Fluffy Wool

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_011.description: A rock-hard, razor-sharp claw from a very unique monster. It may curse anyone who touches it, and this property carries over even after it's processed.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_011.gathering: Phantasm Forest: Monster Drop: - Savage Assassin
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_011.name: Demon Claws

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_012.description: A feather from a giant bird. Since it's many times larger than a feather from a normal bird, a single one can be used for many items. It's light, warm, and durable, and it's often used in expensive bedding.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_012.name: Giant Bird Feather

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_013.description: An egg from a giant bird. Because it's so massive, nutritious, and tasty, it's a highly prized food source. However, stealing it away from the ferocious bird's nest is extremely dangerous.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_013.gathering: Red Cliff: Monster Drop: - Wild Crest
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_013.name: Giant Bird Egg

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_014.description: The power reactor that is the core of a stone golem. It is far more powerful than an ordinary golem's core, and some believe it uses souls of the dead as fuel.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_014.gathering:
Crystal Cave of Oblivion: Monster Drop: - Boulder Soldier
Hidden Magical Village: purchase from ghost shop
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_014.name: Ether Core

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_015.description: A hard shell stripped from a stone golem. It's made of a special stone that is resistant to both heat and impact, and will withstand most attacks. It's extremely difficult to process without alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_015.gathering: Fairystone Eater's Domain: Monster Drop: - Great Guardian
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_015.name: Guardian Armor

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_016.description: Meat from a dragon. They say you'll gain eternal life if you eat it, but that's not true. It is difficult to collect, hard, not tasty, and is not really suitable for eating in general.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_016.gathering: Submerged Lower Town: Monster Drop: - Stout Drake
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_016.name: Dragon Meat
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_016.shop_data:
Adds Item: Dragon Flower
Added by: Baby Wyrm

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_017.description: A wing of a dragon. The thin, strong membrane is used as a high-level armor material. As all dragon materials, it is rare and contains mana, so it is very valuable for alchemists.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_017.gathering: Submerged Lower Town: Monster Drop: - Stout Drake
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_017.name: Dragon Wing
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_017.shop_data:
(Dragon Mat.) Stock Increase
Added by: Cave Bat Wing

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_018.description: An egg of a dragon. It can be obtained from just about any dragon's nest, but it will only hatch under very specific circumstances, so no human has ever been able to hatch one.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_018.gathering: Submerged Lower Town: Monster Drop: - Stout Drake
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_018.name: Dragon Egg
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_018.shop_data:
(Dragon Mat.) Stock Increase
Added by: Giant Bird Egg

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_019.description: An eye of a dragon that is said to have mystical powers to see through everything. It is extremely difficult to collect, and since there are only two per creature, it is an extremely valuable material.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_019.gathering:
Flowerpatch Cape: Monster Drop: - Cloud Liner
Spirit Beast mining everywhere after the tree bridges, & DLC maps
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_019.name: Dragon Eye

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_020.description: A skull of a giant dragon. It's extremely rare to find one fully intact. Only a few were ever found by brave adventurers or lucky wanderers. They sell quickly no matter the price, so it's difficult to get your hands on one.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_020.gathering: Flowerpatch Cape: Monster Drop: - Cloud Liner
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_020.name: Dragon Bone
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_020.shop_data:
(Dragon Mat.) Stock Increase
Added by: Fossil Tree

ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_001.description: A type of seafood that looks a lot like Unis that grow on trees, but is completely unrelated. It is considered to be one of the high-class food ingredients, popular for its sea aroma and rich taste.
ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_001.gathering: Star Guardian Lake: ★☆☆ gather uni on lakebed
ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_001.name: Chestnut

ITEM_MIX_BAKU_UNI.description: A bag containing Uni and a highly combustible powder. When thrown, the shock ignites the powder, and the Uni scatter like shrapnel. Since Uni fly in all directions, it must be used with caution.
ITEM_MIX_BAKU_UNI.name: Explosive Uni

ITEM_MIX_CRAFT.description: A bomb filled with spikes. They'll spread out across a wide range when the bomb explodes.
ITEM_MIX_CRAFT.name: Craft

ITEM_MIX_FLAME.description: A device filled with gunpowder and other explosive materials. Although simple in construction, its flames can spread far and wide and inflict burns in addition to the physical damage from the explosion.
ITEM_MIX_FLAME.name: Bomb

ITEM_MIX_REFERUN.description: A cube-shaped icy explosive. When it explodes, it will send shrapnel and cause frostbite.
ITEM_MIX_REFERUN.name: Ice Bomb

ITEM_MIX_PLAJIG.description: An orb with a powerful magnetic field. Give it a good toss to unleash the power of lightning.
ITEM_MIX_PLAJIG.name: Plajig

ITEM_MIX_LUFT.description: An explosive that rapidly gathers the air around it, creating a gust of wind when it detonates. Although it uses wind magic, it's not a magic tool, it's just a type of bomb.
ITEM_MIX_LUFT.name: Luft

ITEM_MIX_OMEGACRAFT.description: A Craft is a bomb filled with countless spikes, and an Omega Craft is three of those stuck together. Essentially, it's three times the firepower in a single explosion.
ITEM_MIX_OMEGACRAFT.name: Omega Craft

ITEM_MIX_ROSE_FLAME.description: It is shaped like a flower, but this is a proper bomb. It explodes with a graceful red explosion. It was born out of pursuit of beauty in explosion.
ITEM_MIX_ROSE_FLAME.name: Rose Bomb

ITEM_MIX_KLEID_REFERUN.description: Similar to an Ice Bomb, but with a wider range. It unleashes frost in a lovely yet deadly blast. It can also be made to focus all its power on a single point.
ITEM_MIX_KLEID_REFERUN.name: Kleid Ice Bomb

ITEM_MIX_STRAHL_PLAJIG.description: An electric bomb made by combining a number of extremely strong magnetic orbs. When it detonates, it releases multiple rays of electrically charged light that wipe out the enemy.
ITEM_MIX_STRAHL_PLAJIG.name: Strahl Plajig

ITEM_MIX_RATSEL_LUFT.description: A powerful bomb filled with wind magic. It releases a blast of wind followed by a bright light that slashes through the target. It looks like a shining spirit emerging out of nowhere.
ITEM_MIX_RATSEL_LUFT.name: Ratsel Luft

ITEM_MIX_BUBBLE_BULLET.description: A bullet that does not require a gun barrel. When you release it toward the target, it will fly around in the sky and then go in a straight line to the target, exploding on the impact.
ITEM_MIX_BUBBLE_BULLET.name: Bubble Bullet

ITEM_MIX_GENESIS_HAMMER.description: A hammer that has the power to shake the earth with a single powerful strike. It got its name due to the fact that when the earth shakes and the air trembles, it reminds people of the creation of the world.
ITEM_MIX_GENESIS_HAMMER.name: Genesis Hammer

ITEM_MIX_LUNA_LAMP.description: A magical tool that can reverse day and night. When used, the surroundings become dark and a cleansing moon appears in the sky to illuminate the land.
ITEM_MIX_LUNA_LAMP.name: Lunar Lamp

ITEM_MIX_WISEMAN_BOOK.description: A book said to contain all the wisdom of the ancient sages. Each time you turn a page, the energy contained within radiates out in waves.
ITEM_MIX_WISEMAN_BOOK.name: Philosopher's Book
