ITEM_EV_MIX_GRAND_FLAM.description: An explosive made from a regular Bomb and a Rose Bomb. It will hit all of your enemies, but also puts your allies at risk. It is especially effective against targets who already suffer from Burns.
ITEM_EV_MIX_GRAND_FLAM.name: Grand Bomb

ITEM_EV_MIX_CRYSTAL_REFERUN.description: An explosive made from a regular Ice Bomb and a Kleid Ice Bomb. It deals ice damage over the enemy area and inflicts Frostbite. It also reduces ice resistance if the targets are already Frostbitten.
ITEM_EV_MIX_CRYSTAL_REFERUN.name: Crystal Ice Bomb

ITEM_EV_MIX_LAUTE_PLAJIG.description: An explosive made from a Plajig and a Strahl Plajig. It inflicts lightning damage on all enemies and lowers their lightning resistance to minimum. It does little damage, but has a high Stun effect.
ITEM_EV_MIX_LAUTE_PLAJIG.name: Laute Plajig

ITEM_EV_MIX_WIRBEL_LUFT.description: An explosive made from a Luft and a Ratsel Luft. It deals wind damage, and creates a vortex over a large area for a powerful knockback effect.
ITEM_EV_MIX_WIRBEL_LUFT.name: Wirbel Luft

ITEM_EV_MIX_NA.description: An explosive made from an Omega Craft and a Grand Bomb. It's extremely powerful and can quickly strip away an enemy's defense. Using this will require specific traits and effects.
ITEM_EV_MIX_NA.name: N/A

ITEM_EV_MIX_APOCALYPSE.description: Created by combining Philosopher's Book with Lunar Lamp. It deals all four types of elemental damage to the enemy, but also consumes the user's health.
ITEM_EV_MIX_APOCALYPSE.name: Apocalypse

ITEM_EV_MIX_MORTAL_BULLET.description: A magical item that deals massive non-elemental damage to all enemies. The weaker the enemy, the stronger this item becomes. It's especially effective against enemies who have only half of their health left.
ITEM_EV_MIX_MORTAL_BULLET.name: Mortal Bullet

ITEM_MIX_GRASS_BEANS.description: A common medicine that can be created using plants gathered around Kurken Island. It is also common in the royal capital.
ITEM_MIX_GRASS_BEANS.name: Grass Beans

ITEM_MIX_DRY_BISCUIT.description: A traditional food made from flour. Since it's designed to last, it's quite dry and rather flavorless. But it's still favored by many people because it's very filling.
ITEM_MIX_DRY_BISCUIT.name: Dry Biscuit

ITEM_MIX_NECTOR.description: A miracle medicine that revives the unconscious or comatose with a single sip. There is no known way to create it by normal means, so it will never line the shelves of regular stores.
ITEM_MIX_NECTOR.name: Nectar

ITEM_MIX_ASLA_MILK.description: An Ashra-am Baird specialty. Due to the local cows' diet, it's both sweet and sour, and said to be the perfect drink for right after you take a bath.
ITEM_MIX_ASLA_MILK.name: Ashra Milk

ITEM_MIX_ASLA_DONUT.description: A classic Ashra-am Baird delicacy. It's very colorful and so terribly sweet a normal person can get heartburn after eating half of it. It's one of Empel's favorites.
ITEM_MIX_ASLA_DONUT.name: Ashra Donut

ITEM_MIX_COCKTAIL_LEB.description: A fruit-filled dessert. The delicate flavors dance on your tongue, as well as heal your fatigue and replenish your health. Basically, it just makes you feel good.
ITEM_MIX_COCKTAIL_LEB.name: Cocktail Leb

ITEM_MIX_GODDNESS_CUP.description: A cup filled with holy water. Sprinkle it on someone to instantly bless them with massive healing. Drinking it will be even more effective. No one knows if it's the water or the cup that's doing this.
ITEM_MIX_GODDNESS_CUP.name: Goddess Cup

ITEM_MIX_ELIXIR.description: A powerful medicine said to heal all illness and injuries, and even revive the dead. It's one of alchemy's greatest creations, and only a handful of alchemists are skilled enough to make it.
ITEM_MIX_ELIXIR.name: Elixir

ITEM_MIX_NEXFURIA.description: A medicine made by combining a number of Fairystones with Nectar, created to help Fi feel better. Its properties will differ, depending on whether the Fairystones came from Ryza's world or the Underworld.
ITEM_MIX_NEXFURIA.name: Nexfuelia

ITEM_MIX_HERAUS_OINTMENT.description: An ointment that Ryza made to treat Bos's damaged hands. It's designed to protect the affected area while also speeding up recovery.
ITEM_MIX_HERAUS_OINTMENT.name: Heraus Ointment

ITEM_EV_MIX_HOLY_BEANS.description: A medicine made from Grass Beans and Goddess Cup. The lower the target's health, the more effective it is. However, if health is above a certain level, it will be almost useless. Be sure to avoid wasting it!
ITEM_EV_MIX_HOLY_BEANS.name: Holy Beans

ITEM_EV_MIX_MYTHOLOGY_NECTOR.description: A very powerful medicine made from Nectar and Elixir. It's not meant for rapid replenishment, but increases CC gain and provides continuous HP recovery.
ITEM_EV_MIX_MYTHOLOGY_NECTOR.name: Mythic Nectar

ITEM_EV_MIX_INNOCENT_LEB.description: A consumable item made by combining Cocktail Leb and Nectar. It clears all status effects and resets the Stun Gauge.
ITEM_EV_MIX_INNOCENT_LEB.name: Innocent Leb

ITEM_EV_MIX_FORBIDDEN_ELIXIR.description: A fabled medicine made by combining Elixir and Miracle Ebonyal. It replenishes health, clears all status effects, and has some special lasting effects.
ITEM_EV_MIX_FORBIDDEN_ELIXIR.name: Forbidden Elixir

ITEM_EV_MIX_CURE_MILK.description: An extremely expensive but highly effective milk that boosts your immune system. It actually tastes more like blood than milk, though...
ITEM_EV_MIX_CURE_MILK.name: Curative Milk

ITEM_MIX_FISH_OIL.description: Refined oil extracted from fish. It is disliked by many because of its smell and taste, but it refreshes your mind when you ingest it, so it's popular among students.
ITEM_MIX_FISH_OIL.name: Fish Oil

ITEM_MIX_WAR_POWDER.description: A powder that makes you more aggressive in battle. Sprinkling this pungent powder over yourself will bring out your innate fighting instincts to temporarily make you want to fight anything in your path.
ITEM_MIX_WAR_POWDER.name: War Powder

ITEM_MIX_ENERGIANICA.description: A harmonica that will convey your feelings and thoughts through its sound. It provides various enhancements both to the one who plays it and to those who hear it.
ITEM_MIX_ENERGIANICA.name: Energianica

ITEM_MIX_MYSTERIOUS_ROBE.description: A thin cloth with a mystical pattern. Spread it over yourself to protect against all kinds of attacks.
ITEM_MIX_MYSTERIOUS_ROBE.name: Mystic Robe

ITEM_MIX_MIRACLE_DRUG_EBONYAL.description: Also known as the medicine that creates a deal with the devil. You will gain supernatural powers temporarily, but your body will begin to deteriorate. It's practically a poison so it's probably best not use it.
ITEM_MIX_MIRACLE_DRUG_EBONYAL.name: Miracle Ebonyal

ITEM_MIX_ASTRONOMICAL_CLOCK.description: A magical clock with the power to manipulate time. It follows the movement of the stars to change the flow of time and allow you to move faster than your enemies.
ITEM_MIX_ASTRONOMICAL_CLOCK.name: Astronomical Clock

ITEM_EV_MIX_RED_WAR_POWDER.description: A super-sized War Powder. Essentially, it triggers your fighting instincts and increases your attack power, but in return decreases your defensive abilities.
ITEM_EV_MIX_RED_WAR_POWDER.name: Red War Powder

ITEM_EV_MIX_BLUE_STAR_ROBE.description: A magical item created from Mystic Robe and Energianica. It increases either physical or magic resistance, while decreasing the remaining of the two.
ITEM_EV_MIX_BLUE_STAR_ROBE.name: Blue Star Robe

ITEM_EV_MIX_MAD_DRUG_DEVONYAL.description: A medicine created from Miracle Ebonyal and Witch's Potion. When used, it will at first reduce all your stats, but after a while it will boost them in return. If you can't hold on through the first part, it will end up being nothing but poison.
ITEM_EV_MIX_MAD_DRUG_DEVONYAL.name: Lunatic Debonyal

ITEM_EV_MIX_REVERSE_CLOCK.description: A magical item made by combining Astronomical Clock and Lunatic Debonyal. It drops the Tactics Level back to 1, but your team's stats will all increase according to how many levels you lost.
ITEM_EV_MIX_REVERSE_CLOCK.name: Reverse Clock

ITEM_EV_MIX_ORDER_BREAKER.description: It's hard to tell if this medicine helps more than it hurts. It will boost your stats and clear some status effects, but it will also temporarily reduce your maximum health every time you use it.
ITEM_EV_MIX_ORDER_BREAKER.name: Order Breaker

ITEM_MIX_THORNS_EMBRACE.description: A liquid that unleashes thorns. Although it is possible to add various poisons to it, it is mainly used to immobilize the targets by binding them with thorny branches that sprout from it.
ITEM_MIX_THORNS_EMBRACE.name: Thorny Embrace

ITEM_MIX_POISON_SMOKE.description: A special purple powder. When thrown at an enemy, the powder inside reacts on impact, producing a purple smoke filled with toxins.
ITEM_MIX_POISON_SMOKE.name: Poison Smoke

ITEM_MIX_WICH_REMEDY.description: A poison said to be mixed by a witch using a secret method. Some theorize this "witch" was actually an alchemist.
ITEM_MIX_WICH_REMEDY.name: Witch's Potion

ITEM_MIX_HEROIC_GEIST.description: A stone containing a soul of a hero. It unleashes a heroic power that engulfs the area and deals continuous damage to the enemy.
ITEM_MIX_HEROIC_GEIST.name: Heroic Geist

ITEM_EV_MIX_POISON_THORNS_PRISON.description: Created by combining Thorny Embrace and Poison Smoke. In increases the level of any status effects the enemy already has, while also reducing their resistances.
ITEM_EV_MIX_POISON_THORNS_PRISON.name: Poison Thorn Prison

ITEM_EV_MIX_POISON_PRISON.description: A magical item made by combining Poison Smoke and Miracle Ebonyal. It reduces all enemy stats, but also reduces the user's health. It's uses are pretty limited...
ITEM_EV_MIX_POISON_PRISON.name: Bottle of Poison

ITEM_EV_MIX_DEVIL_REMEDY.description: An item made from Witch's Potion and Goddess Cup. It greatly reduces the enemy's speed and defense.
ITEM_EV_MIX_DEVIL_REMEDY.name: Demonic Potion

ITEM_EV_MIX_MASTER_SPIRIT.description: An item made from Heroic Geist and Red War Powder. It seals enemies' powers and consumes them with a curse.
ITEM_EV_MIX_MASTER_SPIRIT.name: Master Spirit

ITEM_MIX_MOWING_SCYTHE.description: A tool that can help you gather grass or flowers. It's easier and cleaner than picking with your bare hands. Small and light, it's easy to handle and use with one hand.
ITEM_MIX_MOWING_SCYTHE.name: Grass Sickle

ITEM_MIX_SPLIT_AXE.description: A tool mainly used to split firewood and chop down trees for lumber. It's quite big and heavy, and has to be held with both hands.
ITEM_MIX_SPLIT_AXE.name: Woodcutter's Axe

ITEM_MIX_FLAME_ROD.description: A long stick with a red orb mounted on the tip. Swing it to shoot fire from the orb to attack enemies. You can also use it to break rocks or crystals to gather materials.
ITEM_MIX_FLAME_ROD.name: Bomb Rod

ITEM_MIX_INSECT_REPELLENT.description: A tool designed to catch insects. It has an extra-long handle to catch flying insects or particularly skittish bugs. It was made to be lightweight to keep it from being too unwieldy.
ITEM_MIX_INSECT_REPELLENT.name: Bug Net

ITEM_MIX_FISHING_ROD.description: Your very own fishing rod. Now you don't have to borrow one from someone else. Still, there's nothing that special about it. It's an ordinary mass-produced fishing rod.
ITEM_MIX_FISHING_ROD.name: Fishing Rod

ITEM_MIX_WIND_SHOES.description: Shoes so light they're said to contain the very spirit of the wind. In fact, they're so light that they actually make you move faster than normal.
ITEM_MIX_WIND_SHOES.name: Wind Shoes

ITEM_MIX_EMERALD_BAND.description: An adventuring tool, the recipe for which was discovered in some ruins. Green light stretches like a rope from the jewel on the armband, allowing the user to access places they wouldn't normally be able to reach.
ITEM_MIX_EMERALD_BAND.name: Emerald Band

ITEM_MIX_SACRED_BEAST_WHISTLE.description: An adventuring tool, the recipe for which was discovered in some ruins. Blowing into it will summon a beast for you to ride. While riding, you'll move faster and have access to special abilities.
ITEM_MIX_SACRED_BEAST_WHISTLE.name: Spirit Beast Whistle

ITEM_MIX_MANA_LANTERN.description: An adventuring tool, the recipe for which was discovered in some ruins. It's a must-have when traveling through dark areas. It's also useful for lighting any stone lanterns you might find.
ITEM_MIX_MANA_LANTERN.name: Mana Lantern

ITEM_MIX_AIR_DROPS.description: A candy that releases air as you lick it, allowing you to breathe even underwater. Once it completely melts, that's it for your air supply, so you have to watch how much you have left.
ITEM_MIX_AIR_DROPS.name: Air Drop

ITEM_MIX_SILENT_SICKLE.description: An improved tool for gathering grass and flowers. It's been modified to make gathering easier, and reaps everything as quietly and lightly as the wind.
ITEM_MIX_SILENT_SICKLE.name: Silent Sickle

ITEM_MIX_GOLDEN_AXE.description: An improved tool for splitting firewood and cutting down trees for lumber. It's been modified for better balance and sharpness, making gathering easier than ever.
ITEM_MIX_GOLDEN_AXE.name: Golden Axe

ITEM_MIX_BLUE_FLAME_ROD.description: A stronger version of the Bomb Rod. The jewel at the tip is blue now, and it can destroy rocks and crystals more easily.
ITEM_MIX_BLUE_FLAME_ROD.name: Blue Bomb Rod

ITEM_MIX_MASTER_INSECT_REPELLENT.description: An improved Bug Net. It doesn't startle insects as easily, and some bugs will even happily fly toward it.
ITEM_MIX_MASTER_INSECT_REPELLENT.name: Master Bug Net

ITEM_MIX_GOD_FISHING_ROD.description: An improved Fishing Rod. It's modeled after the rod used by a legendary god-like fisherman. Fish will no longer flee from it, and some will even be more attracted to it than usual.
ITEM_MIX_GOD_FISHING_ROD.name: Divine Fishing Rod

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_001.description: A common alchemic compound. Any beginner should be able to make this, but as they say those who master neutralizers master synthesis. A red liquid with fire affinity.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_001.name: Red Neutralizer

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_002.description: A common alchemic compound. Any beginner should be able to make this, but as they say those who master neutralizers master synthesis. A blue liquid with ice affinity.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_002.name: Blue Neutralizer

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_003.description: A common alchemic compound. Any beginner should be able to make this, but as they say those who master neutralizers master synthesis. A yellow liquid with lightning affinity.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_003.name: Yellow Neutralizer

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_004.description: A common alchemic compound. Any beginner should be able to make this, but as they say those who master neutralizers master synthesis. A green liquid with wind affinity.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_NEUTRALIZE_004.name: Green Neutralizer

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_001.description: A powder used to polish metals and other hard materials. The powder itself is both hard and fine, ensuring a mirror-smooth finish.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_001.name: Polishing Powder

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_002.description: Paper made using alchemy. It is tougher and more resistant to water and fire than any ordinary paper.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_002.name: Zettel

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_003.description: An improved version of Zettel, the paper made with alchemy. It's coated in a special kind of oil that makes it water and dust resistant, allowing it to maintain its quality for a long time.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_003.name: Reinforced Zettel

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_004.description: Paint made using alchemy. It can be mixed with other colors or diluted with water, just like regular paint, but it's much more durable and will last a long time.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_004.name: Alchemy Paint

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_005.description: A powder of crushed Delphi Rose. It is made to concentrate the flowers' fragrance. Carrying it around in wrapping paper will allow its fragrance to surround you.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SUNDRIES_005.name: Delphi Rose Incense

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_001.description: A dense bar of metal. It's created by melting down natural ore, then collecting the metal portions and letting it harden. It is used as a material for making metal products and armor.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_001.name: Ingot

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_002.description: An ingot with a bluish tint. It's extremely hard and difficult to work with. Its heavy weight also makes it very difficult to use for many blacksmiths.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_002.name: Startium

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_003.description: A black and white ingot with a dull sheen. Can be broken easily along the line that separates the colors, just like the ore.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_003.name: Creaminea

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_004.description: An extravagant gold-colored ingot. It's about the same weight as gold, but it's extremely hard, making it a good material for weapons and armor.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_004.name: Goldoterion

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_005.description: An extremely hard ingot with a rainbow-like shimmer. Despite its hardness, it's fairly easily to process. But it's also very rare, so it's not used in many weapons or armor pieces.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_005.name: Grand Orgen

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_006.description: A mysterious ingot that suddenly started appearing in shops. It could be that many people started requesting it at once, but nobody's quite sure. It's said to bring good luck.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_INGOT_006.name: Samasten

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_001.description: Cloth made from a variety of thread types, including steel. It's used to make all sorts of clothing, and can be incorporated into certain types of armor.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_001.name: Cloth

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_002.description: Cloth made mostly from monster materials. Despite the similar odor, it's not actually leather. Nor is it as durable as leather. It is, however, lighter and more durable than cotton.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_002.name: Bestial Air

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_003.description: A cloth permeated with mana. It's said that the mana gives it its luxurious color and noble scent. This is a special cloth used only where it is appropriate, e.g., for mages' clothes and tools.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_003.name: Sorcery Rose

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_004.description: A very upscale cloth that uses the rarest of materials. Even though it's just cloth, it's woven with great care and has incredible durability. It is often used in formal clothing for people of noble birth.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_004.name: Eldrocode

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_005.description: A special cloth said to contain the knowledge of the sages. It's light yet durable, and resistant to magic. You couldn't ask for a better cloth to use in armor or other defensive items.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_CLOTH_005.name: Weise Cloth

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_001.description: A pearl that's been polished with great care. It was valuable even before, but after such attention it's treated as a rare jewel and commands an even higher price.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_001.name: Pearl Crystal

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_002.description: An amber crystal whose impurities have been removed. It's been polished to bring out its innate beauty, and now it's highly prized as a lovely jewel.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_002.name: Amberlite

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_003.description: An amazingly clear jewel. None of the original materials are purple, but when it goes through the synthesis process, it comes out a pale violet color. Nobody's quite sure why this happens.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_003.name: Spirinite

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_004.description: A jewel made from an incredibly pure Holy Arbor Crystal. It is free of any bubbles or cracks, is beautifully cut, and painstakingly polished. It's one of the most valuable gems in the world.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_004.name: Saint's Diamond

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_005.description: A prismatic gemstone cut at certain angles to accentuate its beauty. It's then further polished until it shines so bright it seems like there might be an actual rainbow inside.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_005.name: Arc en Ciel

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_006.description: A gem made using Emerald Glass. Its true value is not as a decoration, but the core component of an item. So you'll rarely see this used in jewelry or accessories.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_JEWEL_006.name: Waking Emerald

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEASONING_001.description: A sweet liquid found in most beehives. It's used in many foods, especially desserts, or you can just eat it as is. It's good for sore throats and your body in general, but it shouldn't be given to infants.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEASONING_001.name: Honey

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEASONING_002.description: Sugar extracted from the Nectar Rock. It comes out looking like a sugar cube, but it's extremely fragile—press even slightly too hard, and it will immediately crumble and dissolve easily in water.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEASONING_002.name: Eltz Sugar

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEASONING_003.description: A syrup made from three different types of fruit. It's a simple recipe using common ingredients, so it's a popular homemade item. It's most often used to flavor drinks or desserts.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEASONING_003.name: Berry Syrup

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_LIQUID_001.description: Water encased in a transparent membrane. The water is sterile, so it is fit to carry around for long periods of time. You can poke a hole in the membrane to drink, but there is a trick to it. Do it poorly, and it will pop.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_LIQUID_001.name: Traveler's Water Orb

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_LIQUID_002.description: Water that has been purified to the extreme. Since it has essentially no impurities whatsoever, it's the best water to use in synthesis.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_LIQUID_002.name: Super Pure Water

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_LIQUID_003.description: A liquid that enhances reactions between materials. It's important to store it properly and keep it chilled, or it could potentially react to itself.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_LIQUID_003.name: Port Liquid

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MEDICAL_001.description: Medicinal plants and wood cut up into small pieces. Light them on fire to release a calming smoke. But be careful, because you may feel sick if you breathe in too much.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MEDICAL_001.name: Healing Chips

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MEDICAL_002.description: Blessed holy water. It doesn't look any different from normal water, but adding it to a medicinal material will enhance its positive effects.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MEDICAL_002.name: Holy Drop

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MEDICAL_003.description: A strong liquor made by fermenting medicinal materials. It's technically alcohol, so kids aren't allowed to have it. The alcohol burns away harmlessly when you heat it during synthesis.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MEDICAL_003.name: Medicinal Cocktail

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POISON_001.description: A block of concentrated poison. It's very volatile, so unless you want to be covered in poison, you need to keep it in a sealed container. Do not touch with bare hands.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POISON_001.name: Poison Cube

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POISON_002.description: Poison that is also known as demonic water. You can add it to another poisonous material to enhance the overall effect. A poison to make poison. It is said that the purple color is a sign that it is bewitched by the devil.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POISON_002.name: Taboo Drop

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POISON_003.description: A poisonous powder designed for easy transport. In small quantities it can also be used as a medicinal ingredient. But it's easy to get the amount wrong, so always practice caution.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POISON_003.name: Poison Powder

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SAND_001.description: It may look like sand, but it's charged with the power of lightning. A careless touch will leave you paralyzed. A light breeze is enough to whip it up, so you need to be extra careful when handling it.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SAND_001.name: Lightning Sand

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SAND_002.description: Sand that is used to polish especially delicate gemstones. It also has a small amount of powdered diamond mixed in, which helps to create that perfect sheen.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SAND_002.name: Polishing Sand

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_STONE_001.description: Stone material with alternating streaks of color. Its elegant coloring makes it a prized building material in offices or temples, and it can be polished to further increase its luster.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_STONE_001.name: Marblestone

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POWDER_001.description: The perfect mixture of materials for flammability and explosiveness. It's much more volatile than most materials, so you need to take extra caution to avoid flattening your atelier.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POWDER_001.name: Gunpowder Base

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POWDER_002.description: An ember that burns blue for all eternity. It can combust and explode if it is touched by even a smallest spark of flame, so be sure to store it away from other fiery objects. It's closer to being gunpowder than an ember.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POWDER_002.name: Blue Flame Ember

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POWDER_003.description: Gunpowder that detonates at a much lower temperature than normal. Adding it to fire or lightning explosives will reduce their power—it's much better for ice or wind explosives.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_POWDER_003.name: Cool Gunpowder

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FUEL_001.description: A solid fuel mixed with several kinds of oil. It won't actually explode even when exposed to direct flame, so it's relatively safe. Instead, it burns slowly, and can even be relaxing to look at.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FUEL_001.name: Mixing Oil

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FUEL_002.description: Oil of the highest quality made from first-rate ingredients. It burns easily and is difficult to extinguish, so you must be careful when handling it.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FUEL_002.name: Golden Oil

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FUEL_003.description: A material that is stable at room temperature, but rapidly heats up in response to a certain amount of heat. However, it will not ignite. Its surface just becomes red and hot enough to melt.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FUEL_003.name: Meltstone

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FUEL_004.description: A machine overflowing with spirit energy. It has a wide variety of uses, especially when it comes to exploration or battle equipment because of its spiritual properties.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FUEL_004.name: Ether Engine

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FOODSTUFF_001.description: The powdered form of Wasser Wheat. It's used in just about every form of cooking, so a bag of it can be found in most homes.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FOODSTUFF_001.name: Flour

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FOODSTUFF_002.description: Gelatinous powder. When mixed with other ingredients, it turns to jiggly gelatin.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_FOODSTUFF_002.name: Gelatin Powder

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_THREAD_001.description: Fibers synthesized from a combination of animal and plant materials. They don't look too pretty, but they are about as durable as you could ask for.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_THREAD_001.name: Alchemy Fibers

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_THREAD_002.description: A pure white thread reminiscent of angel feathers. It was meticulously crafted by a highly skilled alchemist. The thread itself is finer than any other you can find.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_THREAD_002.name: Heavenly String

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_THREAD_003.description: A type of thread interwoven with steel, making it much more durable than normal. Some say it's strong enough to catch and reel in whales, but most fishing rods can't support a whale anyway.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_THREAD_003.name: Stahl Fiber

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_WOOD_001.description: Lumber made from a holy tree. It's light and flexible, yet very strong. It's perhaps the best lumber you could ask for and has all kinds of uses, but it's incredibly difficult to obtain.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_WOOD_001.name: Holynut Lumber

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_PLANT_001.description: Flakes of dried out plant matter. Although all moisture has been removed, it's actually still alive.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_PLANT_001.name: Dry Powder

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_GAS_001.description: A liquid that turns into an odorless and colorless gas at room temperature. Make sure you have good ventilation, because breathing it in may have ill effects on your body...probably.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_GAS_001.name: Mist Liquid

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_GAS_002.description: A transparent orb that seems to contain swirling wind and feathers. Nobody's sure if the feathers are simply dancing in the wind, or if they create it.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_GAS_002.name: Feather Draft

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ANIMAL_001.description: Animal leather that has been tanned using Puniballs. It loses some of its color during the process, so now it's somewhat translucent. It's less durable than other leathers, but is much more flexible.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ANIMAL_001.name: Puni Leather

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ANIMAL_002.description: An especially tough leather made by combining the skins of different animals and monsters. It's both stronger and lighter than many metals, so it's a common component of lots of expensive leather armor.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ANIMAL_002.name: Master Leather

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ANIMAL_003.description: A type of leather made from dragon materials and high-quality oil. It retains the dragon's magical properties, and weaker monsters will flee at the sight of it.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ANIMAL_003.name: Dread Leather

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_001.description: A transparent flower made using alchemy. Its strong ice affinity makes it a useful synthesis medium, but some people simply keep it around as a decoration.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_001.name: Glass Flower

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_002.description: A small bottle containing elemental power. It has an affinity with all elements, which is useful but also makes it difficult to work with. It's incredibly difficult to synthesize one with high power.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_002.name: Spirit Bottle

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_003.description: An object made using Klint Kingdom technology. It has a special structure that allows it to contain two types of energy within it at once.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_003.name: Cross Cartridge

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_004.description: An advanced material created from the four Elemental Cores. Since it has high affinity with all elements, it's extremely useful in alchemy.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_MYSTIC_004.name: Crystal Element

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ELIXIL_001.description: The ultimate goal for any alchemist. As they continue their research, they all dream of stumbling on some way to create this—which would then let them create anything their heart desires.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ELIXIL_001.name: Philosopher's Stone

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ELIXIL_002.description: A failed Philosopher's Stone created by an ancient alchemist. It contains a vast amount of energy, but isn't as stable as the normal version. As such, it's quite difficult to handle.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_ELIXIL_002.name: Ancient Philosopher's Stone

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_001.description: Seeds of some sort. There's no way to know what will grow until you plant them. Put them in your garden and they will grow into some kind of plant-related material!
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_001.name: Plant Seeds

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_002.description: Seeds of some sort. There's no way to know what will grow until you plant them. Put it them your garden and they will grow into some kind of stone-related material!
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_002.name: Stone Seeds

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_003.description: Seeds of some sort. There's no way to know what will grow until you plant them. Put it them your garden and they will grow into some kind of fire-related material!
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_003.name: Fire Seeds

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_004.description: Seeds of some sort. There's no way to know what will grow until you plant them. Put it them your garden and they will grow into some kind of water-related material!
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_004.name: Water Seeds

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_005.description: Seeds of some sort. There's no way to know what will grow until you plant them. Put it them your garden and they will grow into some kind of mystical material!
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_005.name: Mystic Seeds

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_006.description: Seeds of some sort. There's no way to know what will grow until you plant them. Put it them your garden and they will grow into some kind of poisonous material!
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_006.name: Poison Seeds

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_007.description: This seed will yield a rare material when planted. What that material might be is up to Lady Luck. You might even get something completely useless...
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_SEED_007.name: Golden Seeds

ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_01.description: Ryza's newest staff. It's made from materials made with alchemy, so it's a big improvement compared to her old staff—which she lost.
ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_01.name: True Handmade Staff

ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_02.description: A mysterious staff that can cause odd things to happen in its presence. Because of this, it's not great for battle, unless you really like to live on the edge.
ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_02.name: Mystical Wonder

ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_03.description: A staff that becomes more powerful when its owner is in danger. That might seem nice, but most adventurers try to avoid danger, so it's not too popular. It would be better if it was powerful from the start.
ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_03.name: Inversion

ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_04.description: A staff that features a shiny blue jewel. The jewel looks like a tear shed by the clear blue sky, and helps the wielder remain calm as they cast spells.
ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_04.name: Azure Tear

ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_05.description: A constantly glowing staff. It continues to give off a bright, dazzling light even if you don't do anything. It's said that its light makes the hearts of everyone it shines on brighter.
ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_05.name: Sparkling Reverie

ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_01.description: A bow given to Klaudia by her father, Lubart. It doesn't require arrows, so it's popular with adventurers who want to travel light. But you do need to have some magical talent to use it properly.
ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_01.name: Kurzbogen

ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_02.description: True to its name, this bow is shaped like the tail of an ermine. It can bend quite a bit, making it extra powerful. In case you were wondering, it doesn't use any actual ermine materials.
ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_02.name: Ermine Tail

ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_03.description: A bow said to create wind out of nothing. It's powerful, but its kick is even stronger, so it takes a lot of skill to use it well. Skilled archers can use it to create powerful vortices.
ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_03.name: Wind Blaster

ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_04.description: This bow gained its name from the fact that it makes the archer look like a blue bird with its wings spread. Some say that it brings good fortune, or it was once wielded by a valkyrie, but the truth remains a mystery.
ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_04.name: Lapis Flugel

ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_05.description: This bow is named for the way the arrows it releases shine like stars in the dark. It must be awful seeing someone aim this at you in the darkness...
ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_05.name: Astrumnox

ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_01.description: A huge sword that Lent has used all throughout his training. He's maintained it well, but it's starting to show its age, and is covered in chips and scratches.
ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_01.name: Training Sword

ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_02.description: A sturdy sword that doubles as a shield. It is very heavy, but is also extremely effective for both offense and defense, when you know how to use it.
ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_02.name: Heavy Bulwark

ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_03.description: A cursed greatsword. Although, it actually protects its wielder from the curse, while cursing the enemies. It sounds like whoever created it was pretty thoughtful.
ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_03.name: Hexbringer

ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_04.description: A massive sword that emits a strange aura. It's obviously powerful, but so far nobody has been able to draw out its full potential.
ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_04.name: Ragnarok

ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_05.description: A colossal sword said to have been forged to battle demons. A holy force protects the wielder while also granting the power to tear through their enemies.
ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_05.name: Demon Ender

ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_01.description: A pair of short swords. Each blow deals little damage—speed is the name of the game. Use it right and you can claim victory without giving the enemy time to fight back.
ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_01.name: Cross Daggers

ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_02.description: A pair of swords, made by two blacksmiths living in very different places, each making one. Nobody knows why they were created this way, but the blades seem to be a surprisingly good match.
ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_02.name: Twin Edge

ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_03.description: Dual blades made in the image of the waxing or waning moon—one shines brightly, while the other is hidden in shadow. They were possibly intended more for decoration than battle.
ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_03.name: Halfmoons

ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_04.description: A set of twin swords made to hunt prey as quickly as a ferocious beast. They really shine when used in surprise attacks, and they're sharp enough to take down soft enemies with ease.
ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_04.name: Tiger Wolf Fangs

ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_05.description: Dual swords made from venomous fangs harvested from a two-headed dragon. They look nothing like fangs now, but the dragon's venom still remains.
ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_05.name: Amphisbaena

ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_01.description: A sword that looks like a pointing index finger. It's designed for thrusting rather than slashing. It takes practice to use it well, but the long blade also allows one to attack from a fairly safe distance.
ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_01.name: Index

ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_02.description: A sword made for stabbing. It takes skill to use it well, but if one can master it, it will allow even a shorter wielder to gain extra reach and land critical strikes.
ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_02.name: Piercing Blade

ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_03.description: This sword is structurally unsuitable for defense, and is better suited for aggressive offense. It has a wide blade that does a lot of damage to the enemy.
ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_03.name: Lowen Arger

ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_04.description: A sword once used by the strongest swordsman from a certain school. Due to the metal it was made from, it feels practically weightless, which is where its name comes from.
ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_04.name: Null Circle

ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_05.description: A sentient sword that chooses its own wielder. If a warrior doesn't have a proud soul, they'll never be able to use it no matter how skilled they might be.
ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_05.name: Edel Schwert

ITEM_WEAPON_CLIFFORD_01.description: A treasure that Clifford discovered. It may look old and simple, but it always returns to whoever threw it.
ITEM_WEAPON_CLIFFORD_01.name: Antique Feather

ITEM_WEAPON_CLIFFORD_02.description: A boomerang once used by a forest tribe. It's designed to navigate between trees. Even if you're not a tribe member, it's pretty easy to use once you get the hang of it.
ITEM_WEAPON_CLIFFORD_02.name: Forest Hunter

ITEM_WEAPON_CLIFFORD_03.description: A boomerang whose blade becomes a full circle as it spins. It's good at landing multiple blows simultaneously, but each cut doesn't cause that much damage.
ITEM_WEAPON_CLIFFORD_03.name: Espiral

ITEM_WEAPON_CLIFFORD_04.description: A boomerang that flies quickly in a straight line and returns just as fast, like a hawk. Since it always goes straight, it's easy to predict where it will go.
ITEM_WEAPON_CLIFFORD_04.name: Nimble Hawk

ITEM_WEAPON_CLIFFORD_05.description: A boomerang with homing capabilities that never stops until it hits its target. It requires both strength and skill, but it's certainly worth it in the end.
ITEM_WEAPON_CLIFFORD_05.name: Immortal Chaser

ITEM_WEAPON_SERRI_01.description: An armband that can harness the power of nature. This power can be yours, as long as you have a deep love for nature. Otherwise, it's nothing more than a mere decoration.
ITEM_WEAPON_SERRI_01.name: Nature's Band

ITEM_WEAPON_SERRI_02.description: On top of being a weapon, this band can consume the wearer's water and calories to use them to revive wilted plants. This band puts plants' lives first.
ITEM_WEAPON_SERRI_02.name: Giesskanne

ITEM_WEAPON_SERRI_03.description: If the wearer is in danger, this can lead them to safety. Although the accuracy depends on the item's quality, and if it's really low quality, it might lead them somewhere even more dangerous.
ITEM_WEAPON_SERRI_03.name: Guidance Bangle

ITEM_WEAPON_SERRI_04.description: A brace that can use the surrounding nature to lend strength to the wearer. It's extremely useful in a place surrounded by nature, but if you use it in a place where there is not a lot of nature, it will be of little help.
ITEM_WEAPON_SERRI_04.name: Excelsior Brace

ITEM_WEAPON_SERRI_05.description: This band was once worn by someone known as the Flower Sage. Apparently, this person was always surrounded by flowers, and flowers will bloom wherever the wearer walks.
ITEM_WEAPON_SERRI_05.name: Grand Floracion

ITEM_ARMOR_001.description: A coat typically worn by travelers. The fabric is fairly thin, so it can be worn in most seasons. It also has large inside pockets where you can store plenty of things.
ITEM_ARMOR_001.name: Traveler's Coat

ITEM_ARMOR_002.description: A type of cuirass that's been around a long time. Many local sentries and low-ranking soldiers still use them, but it only protects the center of your body, so its use is limited.
ITEM_ARMOR_002.name: Soldier's Cuirass

ITEM_ARMOR_003.description: Wearing this will allow you to blend into your surroundings, making it harder for enemies to detect you. It won't actually make you invisible, though, so if you shout, they WILL find you.
ITEM_ARMOR_003.name: Mimicry Robe

ITEM_ARMOR_004.description: Armor made using lots of dragon materials. Creating this is a way for blacksmiths to show the world they're world-class. Very few exist, so wearing it always makes you stand out.
ITEM_ARMOR_004.name: Draconic Heart

ITEM_ARMOR_005.description: Seasoned tailors craft this for members of royalty who join the front lines of battles. It may look like normal clothing, but it's lined with thick protective material inside.
ITEM_ARMOR_005.name: Layered Velvet

ITEM_ARMOR_006.description: An outfit popular with the wealthy and aristocratic. As such, there are only few people on Kurken Island who can be seen wearing it, but it is worn by many in the royal capital.
ITEM_ARMOR_006.name: Noble Tunic

ITEM_ARMOR_007.description: This leather armor is popular for its versatility and ease of movement. However, since it covers only vital areas, ignoring everything else, it has almost no defense. Well, it's still better than nothing.
ITEM_ARMOR_007.name: Leather Protector

ITEM_ARMOR_008.description: Bulky armor made from metal alloy. It's easier to make than it looks—apprentice blacksmiths produce them in bulk as part of their training. They provide good protection, but don't sell very well.
ITEM_ARMOR_008.name: Radiant Plate

ITEM_ARMOR_009.description: An outfit made from materials obtained from pixies and spirits. It's extremely light, and seems to provide some amount of healing to the wearer.
ITEM_ARMOR_009.name: Fairy Cloak

ITEM_ARMOR_010.description: This armor is made from a combination of various materials to enhance its performance. It will withstand most normal attacks. It's said it was worn by some very famous knights in the past.
ITEM_ARMOR_010.name: Fortress Armor

ITEM_ACCESSORY_001.description: A charm made to look like an Uni. People always comment how creepily real it looks, which makes sense because it's made with an actual Uni. It's a very popular souvenir.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_001.name: Uni Charm

ITEM_ACCESSORY_002.description: Often made from sheep's wool or weasel fur. Once you put it on, you can't remove it unless you get it wet, so you don't need to worry about losing it. Unless it's raining, of course.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_002.name: Fluffy Tail

ITEM_ACCESSORY_003.description: If you place a photo of someone you want to protect inside, it will allow you to shoulder their hardships for them. It's often exchanged between lovers, but there are also brave hearts who wear one for everyone in their family.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_003.name: Locket of Devotion

ITEM_ACCESSORY_004.description: A circlet said to contain the knowledge of a legendary sage. It boosts the wearer's mana, which might seem nice, but it also puts a tremendous strain on them.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_004.name: Sage Circlet

ITEM_ACCESSORY_005.description: A thick cape once worn by a famous emperor when heading to war. The ornate design attracted enemy attacks, but also raised the morale of soldiers fighting by his side.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_005.name: Kaiser Cape

ITEM_ACCESSORY_006.description: An amulet containing the blessings of the four elemental spirits. It's powerful, but extremely difficult to craft. Depending on how it's made, it may only possess very weak blessings.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_006.name: Four Spirits Amulet

ITEM_ACCESSORY_007.description: Wearing these will reveal enemy weaknesses. The design is not very good, making them somewhat difficult to use, but if you try to change this design, they'll become just a regular pair of sunglasses.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_007.name: Focus Glass

ITEM_ACCESSORY_008.description: Wrapping this around your head seems to provide extra motivation, but it will also make you tired much faster. It's perfect for short, decisive battles, or when studying for final exams.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_008.name: Hot-Blooded Bandana

ITEM_ACCESSORY_009.description: The belt given to the champion of the yearly battle arena. There is only one of these in the entire world, so it probably shouldn't be here at all...
ITEM_ACCESSORY_009.name: Glory Belt

ITEM_ACCESSORY_010.description: An orthodox accessory. Just putting it on makes you feel less tired, so it's recommended for adventurers. Of course, it's very popular among non-adventurers as well, but it's important not to overwork yourself!
ITEM_ACCESSORY_010.name: Energy Pendant

ITEM_ACCESSORY_011.description: A ring popular among adventurers. Its specific effects change according to how it's made. Seasoned alchemists are capable of crafting highly advanced versions.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_011.name: Gnade Ring

ITEM_ACCESSORY_012.description: A necklace designed to last longer while using less metal. It's the perfect gift to give the object of your affection. It's cheap, too.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_012.name: Quartz Necklace

ITEM_ACCESSORY_013.description: A charm intended to ensure safe travels. Wearing it helps keep your legs from getting tired or going numb, so it's perfect for long trips. Marathon contestants will be instantly disqualified if they are caught wearing this.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_013.name: Migratory Charm

ITEM_ACCESSORY_014.description: Wearing this crown will make anyone look more important. It fits snug, so it won't fall off unless you do a handstand. It's quite heavy, so wearing it for prolonged periods will hurt your neck.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_014.name: Baron's Crown

ITEM_ACCESSORY_015.description: An exclusive ring for alchemists. It takes two Philosopher's Stones to craft. Naturally, there is a risk of theft, but if it's stolen, it will lose all its powers.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_015.name: Elixir Ring

ITEM_EV_ACCESSORY_001.description: A tail accessory that moves according to the wearer's emotions. It's been reported that wearing it for too long can actually cause the tail's movement to affect the wearer's emotions.
ITEM_EV_ACCESSORY_001.name: Innocent Riches

ITEM_EV_ACCESSORY_002.description: Apparently, your concentration will improve when you tie this on. The longer you wear it, the more it will hone your nerves and the stronger the effect will become.
ITEM_EV_ACCESSORY_002.name: Enlightened Bandana

ITEM_EV_ACCESSORY_003.description: An accessory made for knights defending the kingdom. It's good at absorbing damage, making it great for long, drawn-out battles, but it's said it's not very effective against anything but direct attacks.
ITEM_EV_ACCESSORY_003.name: Soul of Fortitude

ITEM_EV_ACCESSORY_004.description: An amulet that grants the wearer power beyond human knowledge. The effect is powerful, but also puts stress on the body. As such, only those who can withstand the strain should attempt to use it.
ITEM_EV_ACCESSORY_004.name: Cosmos

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_001.description: A key necessary to enter the Maiden's Catacombs. All you need to do is place it in the depression, but since there are no hints whatsoever, figuring that out is not a simple task.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_001.name: Mysterious Relic

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_002.description: The key piece of the living bell clapper. You need it to activate the bell, but it's not clear how it can move on its own. Even modern technology can't seem to replicate the process.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_002.name: Broken Orb

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_003.description: Oil used to open a rusted gate. No matter how stiff an object is, this can get it moving. It's not flammable, so it can't be used as fuel.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_003.name: Glorious Oil

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_004.description: A dangerous oil that ignites at room temperature. Due to this, it's not often used in modern times, but it is thought that ancient people used it on a daily basis.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_004.name: Solar Oil

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_005.description: Medicine made to help Fi feel better. It contains Underworld mana, so it is poisonous to anyone other than Underworld creatures.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_005.name: Mystic Star Water

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_006.description: A sapling of a great tree that grows extremely quickly once planted. Planting it in the side of a cliff will make it grow horizontally, creating a makeshift bridge.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_006.name: Great Tree Seedling

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_007.description: A branch collected from a mysterious glowing tree. Nobody knows where the light comes from, but even branches broken off of it continue to shine, so it must be something within the wood.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_007.name: Divine Branch

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_008.description: A piece of the artificial dragon "skeleton". It is created from a material that hasn't deteriorated even a little, even after centuries of exposure in a harsh environment. There is no modern technology that can recreate it.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_008.name: Dragon Skeleton Device

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_009.description: The bracelet that Ryza made as a symbol of her friendship with Klaudia. It's an ornamental item designed with fashion in mind more than practical use.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_009.name: Memoria Bracelet

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_010.description: A set of Clifford's trusted tools that he uses in his treasure hunting adventures. It shows evidence of repeated repairs, but it looks like it's beyond his skill this time.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_010.name: Broken Cherished Tools

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_011.description: Clifford's tools, reborn. There are a lot of different types, and it's difficult to tell what they are for. Thanks to Ryza, they should be much more durable now.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_011.name: Treasure Kit

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_012.description: Several seeds from the Segur Nohak flower, which Ryza created using alchemy. The flower has amazing purifying properties, and can hopefully restore the Underworld's polluted soil.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_012.name: Segur Nohak Seeds

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_013.description: A flower with incredible purifying properties. It normally blooms white, but in polluted soil it soaks up the toxins and gains a wide variety of colors.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_013.name: Segur Nohak

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_014.description: A fruit that Cassandra was able to grow thanks to the fertilizer Ryza came up with. It's extremely sweet, and is especially popular among children.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_014.name: Sweet Pom

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_015.description: A tart made using Sweet Pom, which Ryza came up with as a reward for Cassandra. It's interesting that she was able to make it using alchemy, rather than just baking it.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_015.name: Pom Tart

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_016.description: A land development bomb requested by Mr. Abelheim. Since it is used to destroy rocks and other objects, it was made with an emphasis on the power of the explosion.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_016.name: Demolition Bomb

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_017.description: A liquid intended for use on a strange bud found in the Sunken City of Stars. It has to be extracted from Fairystone Fragments.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_017.name: Mana Liquid

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_018.description: A stone filled with Underworld mana, which Empel happened to discover while he was traveling the land closing gates leading to the Underworld.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_018.name: Underworld Fairystone

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_019.description: A medicine that apparently forces you to speak your mind. In reality, it's just a combination of vitamins. But it is quite effective for those who want to believe that it's real.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_019.name: Ryza's (Fake) Medicine

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_020.description: A nutrient-rich compound designed to help plants grow large, healthy fruit. It's poisonous to both animals and people, and if you drink it, you need to spit it out immediately.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_020.name: Plant Food

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_021.description: A treatment created to improve the soil quality at Cassandra's farm. It directly harnesses sunlight to create nutrients, allowing crops to grow even in otherwise barren ground.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_021.name: Sunlight Soil

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_022.description: A flower with the power to purify polluted soil. Legend tells of a disaster that poisoned the land, but the people used this flower to purify it. The flower is extremely rare these days.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_022.name: White Flower of Purity

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_023.description: A small drill that can grind and shape even the hardest metals. It was designed for Dennis to use in his blacksmithing and goldsmithing work.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_023.name: Crafter's Drill

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_024.description: A mountain of letters. Who wrote them all? Klaudia. Who are they all for? Ryza, of course.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_024.name: Mountain of Envelopes

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_025.description: An alchemy tool that creates essences for use in synthesis. Simply insert special elemental energy called Mist, and you can create an essence based on that specific element.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_025.name: Celestial Instrument

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_026.description: A jewel-like stone. It's a Brunnen family heirloom, and recently it began emitting a strange light, so Moritz gave it to Ryza to find out what it is. It's slightly warm to the touch.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_026.name: Fi's Egg

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_027.description: An ancient artifact compass. It can't be used normally, but it lights up when entering ruins and is extremely useful there.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_027.name: Compass

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_028.description: An item that increases maximum CC. This allows you to temporarily equip items that would normally be beyond your CC limit.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_028.name: Core Shard

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_029.description: One of the necessary components for activating Core Drive. Without this, you won't be able to unleash Core Drive during Item Rush.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_029.name: Drive Fragment

ITEM_KEY_RESERVE_001.description: A fruit from the Kurken Island. It is known as Kurken Fruit on the island itself, but in the royal capital it's known under the name "Luceaux". It's very moist, and is sweeter when it's fresh.
ITEM_KEY_RESERVE_001.name: Luceaux

ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_001.description: A fragment of memories of the people who lived here long ago. A specter of the owner of the memory may often be seen next to it.
ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_001.name: Memory Fragment

ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_002.description: Information about the ruins that's necessary to navigate through them. It's part of a greater whole, and any one piece isn't enough to solve the mystery of the ruins.
ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_002.name: History Fragment

ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_003.description: Important information concerning the ruins. It's full of holes, so it's mostly useless by itself.
ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_003.name: Archeology Record

ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_004.description: A collection of notes and clues found in the ruins to help figure out the mystery. It has pictures and personal thoughts in addition to the collected information.
ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_004.name: Exploration Notes

ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_005.description: A relic of the past, uncovered in the Sunken City of Stars. It seems to refer to the Age of Legends, but is written in a dead language, so it will take some time to translate.
ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_005.name: Old Scroll

ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_006.description: A relic of the past, uncovered in the Sunken City of Stars. A simple object left behind by the people of a bygone era, it may be cheap and worthless, or unimaginably valuable.
ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_006.name: Old Accessory

ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_007.description: A segment of a bell's clapper. Reattaching this to the bell will make it ring, and its sound will echo throughout the catacombs.
ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_007.name: Living Bell Fragment

ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_008.description: A crystallized form of Starchild's memory, synthesized using the information obtained in the Sunken City of Stars.
ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_008.name: Nebula Core

ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_009.description: A jewel-like orb that Ryza made in the image of the Flame Crystal. Its power output is far less than the original, but it's enough to activate the ruins' systems, at least temporarily.
ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_009.name: Custom Flame Crystal

ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_010.description: Aromatic firewood made by processing wood from the glowing sacred tree. Burning this in a special furnace creates a smoke that can lift the fog covering the forest.
ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_010.name: Awakening Incense

ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_011.description: A glittery, reddish-purple liquid designed to fuel the dragon's heart in the legendary Dragonbone Valley. It's not actually blood, but since it gets the "heart" moving, it's called that anyway.
ITEM_RUINS_ITEM_011.name: Dragon Device Blood

ITEM_QUEST_001.description: Objects dropped by the girl in the market. They were scattered all over the market because of the way she dropped them.
ITEM_QUEST_001.name: Girl's Lost Items

ITEM_QUEST_002.description: Some sort of fragment found within some ruins. It's caked in dirt, so it looks like some random pebble. But perhaps it can be reunited with its fellow fragments...
ITEM_QUEST_002.name: Ancient Fragment

ITEM_QUEST_003.description: A scroll that mentions the location of the treasure hidden away in a big tree. It contains the comparison of the two different versions of the book, and it is a scroll...because that's the way Ryza likes it.
ITEM_QUEST_003.name: Ancient Scroll

ITEM_QUEST_004.description: A salty pudding snack. Really, it's just a bit of pudding topped with a sardine. It looks terrible, frankly, but it's surprisingly delicious!
ITEM_QUEST_004.name: Sarding

ITEM_QUEST_005.description: A bundle of special grass that Karina, who is afraid of men, uses to convince herself that men are just plants... Well, it's just a bunch weeds that grow everywhere, and don't actually have any effect.
ITEM_QUEST_005.name: Sidewalk Grass

ITEM_QUEST_006.description: A sweet dessert with a distinct texture. It's much richer than anything you'd find around Rasen, and it's quite popular with the men of the capital.
ITEM_QUEST_006.name: Pudding

ITEM_QUEST_007.description: A choker decorated with Samasten, a surprisingly brittle ore. Ryza took the recipe Dennis gave her and succeeded in making a rather lovely ornament.
ITEM_QUEST_007.name: Samasten Necklace

ITEM_ESSENCE_001.description: An essence with fire properties that can be used during synthesis. Using it in a Material Loop will increase its maximum effect and change its element to fire.
ITEM_ESSENCE_001.name: Fire Essence

ITEM_ESSENCE_002.description: An essence with ice properties that can be used during synthesis. Using it in a Material Loop will increase the maximum effect and change its element to ice.
ITEM_ESSENCE_002.name: Ice Essence

ITEM_ESSENCE_003.description: An essence with lightning properties that can be used during synthesis. Using it in a Material Loop will increase the maximum effect and change its element to lightning.
ITEM_ESSENCE_003.name: Lightning Essence

ITEM_ESSENCE_004.description: An essence with wind properties that can be used during synthesis. Using it in a Material Loop will increase the maximum effect and change its element to wind.
ITEM_ESSENCE_004.name: Wind Essence

ITEM_ESSENCE_005.description: An essence more powerful than the basic elemental essences. It affects the whole synthesis process and increases the quality of the materials.
ITEM_ESSENCE_005.name: Aurora Essence

ITEM_ESSENCE_006.description: An essence more powerful than the basic elemental essences. It affects the whole synthesis process and raises the Effect Table maximum for all Material Loops by 1.
ITEM_ESSENCE_006.name: Polaris Essence

ITEM_ESSENCE_007.description: An essence more powerful than the basic elemental essences. It affects the whole synthesis process, increases the stability of the altered recipe and allows to add extra materials.
ITEM_ESSENCE_007.name: Celestial Essence

ITEM_ESSENCE_008.description: An essence more powerful than the basic elemental essences. It affects the whole synthesis process and allows to increase Element Values of the materials.
ITEM_ESSENCE_008.name: Aether Essence

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_048.description: Changes your interior to something with more of a rustic, rural flavor. It's popular with young people in the big city, since it's pretty extraordinary compared to their everyday lives.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_048.name: Countryside Interior

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_049.description: Changes your interior to feel hot and dry. It's a little unusual as far as decorations go, but people from this type of region love it since it reminds them of home.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_049.name: Arid Region Interior

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_001.description: Changes your interior to something a little more plain. It has certainly got a calming effect, but it's also kind of boring. To be honest, it feels a little out of place in the royal capital.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_001.name: Rustic Interior

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_002.description: Changes your interior to a more casual, easygoing feel. It's not too plain, but also isn't overly loud or obnoxious. It would feel right at home in any nation or region in the world.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_002.name: Casual Interior

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_008.description: A cute doll that's big and round. Sitting down and giving it a long hug is a good way to relax, and it's also the perfect size to use as a pillow.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_008.name: Chick Doll

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_009.description: A decoration made from carved crystal. It's extremely hard and heavy. Place it on your windowsill and watch as the sun creates a dancing variety of light and dark patterns on your floor.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_009.name: Crystal Object

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_010.description: Each one is made by hand, so they're all slightly different. It also has a flexible iron frame inside, so you can move and pose it however you like.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_010.name: Fairy Doll

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_011.description: Looks, feels, and smells like real jelly. It's important to remember, however, that it's intended purely for decoration. Put it in your mouth and all you'll taste is the dye...
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_011.name: Puni Jelly

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_012.description: A surprisingly realistic facsimile of a Puni. You might even find yourself mistaking it for the real thing... People have been known to become startled and attack it out of nowhere.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_012.name: Puni Doll

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_013.description: A stand that allows you to show off your most prized possessions. It was born to stand in the spotlight, but never be seen.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_013.name: Exhibition Stand

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_014.description: A simple light source in the shape of a lantern. There's no actual fire inside, and yet somehow it seems to flicker and glow...
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_014.name: Hanging Lantern

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_015.description: A good place to have a snack. A pot of tea and a few cookies is enough to occupy just about the entire thing. It's not the most useful piece of furniture, but it makes the room look stylish.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_015.name: Round Table

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_016.description: An expensive-looking sofa. It might not look too comfortable, but it's soft enough that you can sink right into it. It needs regular care, though, so it can be a bit of a pain.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_016.name: Leather Sofa

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_017.description: A top-quality sofa that's not too hard and not too soft. Comfy to sit on, and easy to stand up from. Of course, once you sit down, you won't want to stand up anytime soon...
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_017.name: Chic Sofa

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_018.description: A low table with an attractive design that's stylish without being too gaudy. It goes well with any decor, so if you're not sure what to pick...just pick this!
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_018.name: Elegant Low Table

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_019.description: A huge clock with a swinging pendulum. It rings out every hour on the hour, so it's great for people who like to be punctual. You'll need a lot of extra space for it, though.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_019.name: Pendulum Clock

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_020.description: A full 88-key piano. The keys are lighter than average, so it's good for children and beginners.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_020.name: Piano

ITEM_DLC_001.description: A small bed with a simple design. It's a bit big for a child, but will begin to feel cramped after a certain age. Some people actually find that feeling comforting, in a way...
ITEM_DLC_001.name: Cute Bed

ITEM_DLC_002.description: An expensive bed designed for members of the aristocracy. It's not easy to get your hands on, but the top-notch comfort is simply unforgettable.
ITEM_DLC_002.name: Extravagant Bed

ITEM_DLC_003.description: The one, the only...Barrel! These are found all over the city, but placing one in your room transforms it into a trendy piece of furniture. ...Okay, maybe not. Still, when you see one, you can't help but shout out "Barrel!"
ITEM_DLC_003.name: Barrel

ITEM_DLC_004.description: A very trendy bench. It was originally designed to be placed outside on grass, but more and more people these days are putting them indoors.
ITEM_DLC_004.name: Fashionable Bench

ITEM_DLC_005.description: A table designed for use in a garden. It's not too big, and can be folded up to save space. Due to its compact size, people who live alone tend to find a spot for it inside.
ITEM_DLC_005.name: Garden Table

ITEM_DLC_006.description: A potted plant with seasonal flowers. The small, beautiful flowers are susceptible to thirst and will easily die if not watered daily.
ITEM_DLC_006.name: Potted Plant

ITEM_DLC_007.description: A stuffed doll designed to look like one of the Oren. But those who knew the model say that they would be a different person if they ever smiled like that...
ITEM_DLC_007.name: Oren Doll

ITEM_DLC_008.description: A small bell used to notify family or guests that dinner is ready. Even if you live alone, it's kind of fun to ring it before you eat.
ITEM_DLC_008.name: Dinner Bell

ITEM_DLC_009.description: A legendary sword that only the chosen hero can draw out. ...That's the feeling it's going for, anyway. The "buried" sword doesn't actually have a blade, so pulling on it will just break it.
ITEM_DLC_009.name: Decorative Sword

ITEM_DLC_010.description: A bed used at the fanciest inns in a far-off tropical nation. The light cloth breathes really well, keeping you cool and letting you get a comfortable night's sleep.
ITEM_DLC_010.name: Resort Bed

ITEM_DLC_011.description: A sofa found in only the nicest inns in the world. The cushion is firm enough to keep you from feeling like you're sinking, allowing for hours and hours of untroubled relaxation.
ITEM_DLC_011.name: Resort Sofa

ITEM_DLC_012.description: A fairly affordable table paired with a slightly expensive tablecloth. Be careful not to get it dirty, because stains will stick out like a sore thumb on the white cloth.
ITEM_DLC_012.name: Table with Tablecloth

ITEM_DLC_013.description: A small, self-contained palm tree. It won't grow past a certain size, but at the same time it will never bear fruit.
ITEM_DLC_013.name: Potted Palm

ITEM_DLC_014.description: A stand used by musical conductors, it's also good if you happen to know any flute players. And even if you don't play music, it's a good way to display your favorite music score.
ITEM_DLC_014.name: Music Stand

ITEM_DLC_015.description: A manuscript that's far too big to carry around with you. It's an ancient text written in a lost language, so it'll have to be translated first. Judging by the pictures, it seems to contain recipes of some sort.
ITEM_DLC_015.name: Giant Manuscript

ITEM_DLC_016.description: A plant that bears the small fruit favored among fairies. They say that as the fruit grows, fairies can smell it from any distance and will come to have a taste.
ITEM_DLC_016.name: Pixie Pot

ITEM_DLC_017.description: A chair modeled after the ones belonging to the Great Elementals. Its hard surface creates an air of authority, but also means it's not very comfortable. The real chairs are quite soft, by the way...
ITEM_DLC_017.name: Great Elemental's Chair

ITEM_DLC_018.description: An object that clearly demonstrates the movement of the stars. It's quite affordable, and since it so accurately describes the movement of celestial bodies, pretty much every astronomer owns one.
ITEM_DLC_018.name: Celestial Body Model

ITEM_DLC_019.description: A stock photo often found in tourist shops in farming villages. It's a pretty plain picture, so it's not very popular even among generic landscape photos. Still, country folks seem to love it.
ITEM_DLC_019.name: Farm Photo

ITEM_DLC_020.description: A well-known photo found in shops throughout the countryside. Nobody's quite sure where the photo was actually taken, but the image itself is surprisingly famous.
ITEM_DLC_020.name: Countryside Photo

ITEM_DLC_021.description: A rocking chair made from light materials. It's easy to move around, and looks just as nice in your room as it does on your front porch.
ITEM_DLC_021.name: Rocking Chair

ITEM_DLC_022.description: An ordinary sofa. It's long enough to comfortably seat three people, and you can even use it as a bed.
ITEM_DLC_022.name: Cute Sofa

ITEM_DLC_023.description: A common blackboard. It's great for writing out your thoughts when you're working or studying, and it's also a convenient way of puzzling out new alchemy recipes.
ITEM_DLC_023.name: Blackboard

ITEM_DLC_024.description: A bronze statue that's...hard to comment on. Why did they use the weapon blacksmith as the model? Why is he naked? Who decided to put it here...?
ITEM_DLC_024.name: Blacksmith Statue

ITEM_DLC_025.description: Is this a piece of furniture? An accessory? Just a pet? It's alive, so you'll have to take care of it. But it's also friendly, so you can keep it indoors. Just...make sure you take good care of it.
ITEM_DLC_025.name: Goat

ITEM_DLC_026.description: A roasted bun. Soft on the inside, crispy on the outside. You can eat it...but then you'll have to get another one.
ITEM_DLC_026.name: Crisp Bun

ITEM_DLC_027.description: A toy version of a pumpkin-headed fairy. This mischievous spirit appears in stories from distant lands, and is said to toss out candy before suddenly flying away.
ITEM_DLC_027.name: Pumpkin Doll

ITEM_DLC_028.description: A sphere with a map of the world drawn on it. Looking at it makes the capital seem so small... It also shows Kurken Island, but it basically just appears as a tiny dot of ink.
ITEM_DLC_028.name: Globe

ITEM_DLC_029.description: Toss in whatever you want to transport, aim it in the direction of the person you want it to go to, and fire away! That's the idea, anyway, but it's hard to find a decor to go with it.
ITEM_DLC_029.name: Transport Cannon

ITEM_DLC_031.description: An extremely large Kurken Fruit. They can get this big if you keep it in the right environment, feed it plenty of nutrients, and let it grow past harvest season. It tastes a bit watery, though...
ITEM_DLC_031.name: Giant Kurken Fruit

ITEM_DLC_032.description: Sweets that are stacked in perfect balance. Their sweet aroma will make you want to try them, but since they're stacked in perfect balance, you're likely to destroy the whole construction if you touch it.
ITEM_DLC_032.name: Mountain of Sweets

ITEM_DLC_033.description: A horn made in a faraway land. They claim it's made from a dragon's horn, but it's almost certainly some other creature. Still, it can perfectly replicate a dragon's cry.
ITEM_DLC_033.name: Exotic Horn

ITEM_DLC_034.description: A basket filled with colorful apples. They're only decorative, though, and are attached directly to the basket. The smell comes from the included potpourri.
ITEM_DLC_034.name: Apple Basket

ITEM_DLC_035.description: An actual suit of armor worn by an actual knight. In addition to being a classy decoration, it's also good for emergency self-defense. It's real metal, though, so it's extremely heavy.
ITEM_DLC_035.name: Knight's Armor

ITEM_DLC_036.description: A big stuffed animal. It's very cute and fun to hug, but it's also kind of expensive. Not everyone can afford it, but every little girl certainly looks forward to getting one of her own.
ITEM_DLC_036.name: Teddy Bear

ITEM_DLC_037.description: A picture frame made of very fine wood. It was obtained from a chest in a mysterious stone chamber. The interior of the chamber looked very old, but this item is as clean as new. Very strange indeed...
ITEM_DLC_037.name: Beautiful Picture Frame

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_PHY_8.description: [Physical] Deals amazing non-elemental damage and reduces DEF.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_PHY_8.name: Giant Explosion

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_PHY_9.description: [Physical] Deals deadly non-elemental damage and reduces DEF.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_PHY_9.name: Infinite Explosion

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_6.description: [Magic] Deals moderate fire damage. Highly increased damage with higher Tactics Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_6.name: Crimson Fire

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_7.description: [Magic] Deals serious fire damage. Highly increased damage with higher Tactics Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_7.name: Searing Petal

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_8.description: [Magic] Deals massive fire damage. Highly increased damage with higher Tactics Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_8.name: Hellfire Rose

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_9.description: [Magic] Deals serious fire damage. Highly increased damage if target has Burns.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_9.name: Extra Firepower

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_10.description: [Magic] Deals massive fire damage. Highly increased damage if target has Burns.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FIRE_10.name: Apocalypse Flame

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_6.description: [Magic] Deals moderate ice damage. Increased damage at Tactics Level 3 or higher.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_6.name: Embracing Ice

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_7.description: [Magic] Deals serious ice damage. Greatly increased damage at Tactics Level 3 or higher.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_7.name: Freezing Waltz

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_8.description: [Magic] Deals massive ice damage. Greatly increased damage at Tactics Level 3 or higher.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_8.name: Glacial Rondo

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_9.description: [Magic] Deals serious ice damage. Reduces ice resistance if target has Frostbite.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_9.name: Diamond Dust

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_10.description: [Magic] Deals massive ice damage. Reduces ice resistance if target has Frostbite.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_ICE_10.name: Whiteout

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_6.description: [Magic] Deals moderate lightning damage. Increased damage at Tactics Level 5.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_6.name: Electrified Flash

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_7.description: [Magic] Deals serious lightning damage. Greatly increased damage at Tactics Level 5.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_7.name: Super Vibration Laser

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_8.description: [Magic] Deals massive lightning damage. Greatly increased damage at Tactics Level 5.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_8.name: Vibration Laser Gamma

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_9.description: [Magic] Deals moderate lightning damage. Has high Stun damage.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_9.name: Avalanche

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_10.description: [Magic] Deals serious lightning damage. Has very high Stun damage.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_THUN_10.name: Roaring Avalanche

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_6.description: [Magic] Deals moderate wind damage. Increased damage with higher CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_6.name: Gust Fang

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_7.description: [Magic] Deals serious wind damage. Increased damage with higher CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_7.name: Divine Whirl

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_8.description: [Magic] Deals massive wind damage. Increased damage with higher CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_8.name: Wind God Whirl

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_9.description: [Magic] Deals moderate wind damage and delays the target's turn.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_9.name: Brave Storm

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_10.description: [Magic] Deals serious wind damage and heavily delays the target's turn.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WIND_10.name: Brave Tempest

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_1.description: [Physical] Deals decent non-elemental damage. Increased damage if enemy is stunned.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_1.name: Bubble Bullet

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_2.description: [Physical] Deals moderate non-elemental damage. Increased damage if enemy is stunned.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_2.name: Balloon Bullet

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_3.description: [Physical] Deals serious non-elemental damage. Increased damage if enemy is stunned.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_3.name: Grenade

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_4.description: [Physical] Deals massive non-elemental damage. Increased damage if enemy is stunned.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_4.name: Quaking Cannon

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_5.description: [Physical] Deals amazing non-elemental damage. Increased damage if enemy is stunned.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_5.name: Shining Cannon

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_6.description: [Physical] Deals serious non-elemental damage. Increased damage the lower the target's remaining HP.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_6.name: Finishing Strike

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_7.description: [Physical] Deals massive non-elemental damage. Increased damage the lower the target's remaining HP.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_BUBBLE_BULLET_7.name: Ruthless Strike

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_1.description: [Magic] Deals moderate lightning damage, with a chance for instant KO. Increased damage at Tactics Level 5.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_1.name: Rock Crusher

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_2.description: [Magic] Deals moderate lightning damage, with a chance for instant KO. Increased damage at Tactics Level 5.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_2.name: Mountain Crusher

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_3.description: [Magic] Deals moderate lightning damage, with a chance for instant KO. Increased damage at Tactics Level 5.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_3.name: Continental Crusher

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_4.description: [Magic] Deals moderate lightning damage, with a chance for instant KO. Increased damage at Tactics Level 5.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_GENESIS_HAMMER_4.name: Star Crusher

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_1.description: [Magic] Deals moderate non-elemental damage, and delays the target's turn. Increased damage with higher Item Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_1.name: Crescent Moon Light

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_2.description: [Magic] Deals serious non-elemental damage, and delays the target's turn. Increased damage with higher Item Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_2.name: Full Moon Light

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_3.description: [Magic] Deals massive non-elemental damage, and delays the target's turn. Increased damage with higher Item Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_3.name: New Moon Light

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_4.description: [Magic] Deals amazing non-elemental damage, and delays the target's turn. Increased damage with higher Item Level.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_LUNA_LAMP_4.name: Bright Moon Light

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_1.description: [Magic] Deals moderate fire and wind damage. Increased damage with higher current CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_1.name: The Color of Proof

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_2.description: [Magic] Deals moderate fire and wind damage. Increased damage with higher current CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_2.name: The Secret of Lies

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_3.description: [Magic] Deals moderate fire and wind damage. Increased damage with higher current CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_3.name: The Circle of Truth

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_4.description: [Magic] Deals moderate fire and wind damage. Increased damage with higher current CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_4.name: The Law of the World

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_5.description: [Magic] Deals moderate fire and wind damage. Increased damage with higher current CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_5.name: The Proof of Ruin

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_6.description: [Magic] Deals moderate fire and wind damage. Increased damage with higher current CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_6.name: The Truth of Ruin

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_7.description: [Magic] Deals moderate ice and lightning damage.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_7.name: The Heart of Proof

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_8.description: [Magic] Deals moderate ice and lightning damage. Increased damage with higher current CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_8.name: The Light of Lies

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_9.description: [Magic] Deals moderate ice and lightning damage. Increased damage with higher current CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_9.name: The Axis of Truth

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_10.description: [Magic] Deals moderate ice and lightning damage. Increased damage with higher current CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_10.name: The Vow of Truth

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_11.description: [Magic] Deals moderate ice and lightning damage. Increased damage with higher current CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_11.name: The Proof of Chaos

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_12.description: [Magic] Deals moderate ice and lightning damage. Increased damage with higher current CC.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_WISEMAN_BOOK_12.name: The Truth of Chaos

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FLAME_01.description: [Magic] Deals slight non-elemental damage and decreases physical resistance.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FLAME_01.name: Exhaustion Explosion

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FLAME_02.description: [Magic] Deals decent non-elemental damage and decreases physical resistance.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_FLAME_02.name: Giant Exhaustion Explosion

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_REFERUN_01.description: [Magic] Deals slight non-elemental damage and decreases magic resistance.
ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_REFERUN_01.name: Mental Fatigue Explosion

ITEM_EFF_DAMAGE_REFERUN_02.description: [Magic] Deals decent non-elemental damage and decreases magic resistance.
